MAT 5:10 Meid pai, me kamekameki pun, pwe nairail wein nanlan.
MAT 5:11 Komail meid pai, ma irail lalaue o paki komail o palian komail ni arail lokaia jued o likam pweki nai.
MAT 5:12 Komail injenemau o perenda kaualap; pweki katine pamail me lapalap nanlan. Pwe iduen irail paki jaukop oko, me mo ’mail.
MAT 5:13 Jol pan jappa komail. A ma jol jara jan, da me a pan joleki? Nan a pan me mal kot, men lokidokila, o aramaj en tiak pajan.
MAT 5:14 Marain pan jappa komail, Kanim eu, me mi pon dol eu, jota kak rirla.
MAT 5:15 Aramaj pil jota kin ijikeda lamp eu, ap ki on pan kajak, pwe pon deu a, o a kin kamaraini toun im karoj.
MAT 5:16 Iduen omail marain en janjal mon aramaj, pwe irail en udial omail wiawia man kan, ap kapikapina Jam omail, me kotiluit nanlan.
MAT 5:17 Eder kikion me I kodon, tiakedi kapun de jaukop akan. I jota kodon tiakedi, a pwen kapwaiada.
MAT 5:18 Pwe melel, I indai on komail, lao lan o jappa pan poula, jota iota eu de kijin muai en kapun eu pan lokidokila, lao karoj pan pwaida.
MAT 5:19 Ari, meamen me tiakedi eu kijin kujoned tikitik pukat, ap pil padaki on aramaj, ren tiakedi, nan a pan tikitik nan wein nanlan. A meamen, me oke o padaki on aramaj, ren oke, i me pan lapalap nan wein nanlan,
MAT 5:20 Pwe I indai on komail, ma omail pun jo man jan pun en jaunkawewe o Parijar, akan, komail jota pan kak pedelon on nan wein nanlan.
MAT 5:21 Komail ronadar, mo a loki, on men kaua: Koe der kamela aramaj I A me pan kamela aramaj, pan panalan kadeik o.
MAT 5:22 A I indai on komail, meamen makarada mal pan ri a ol, pan panalan kadeik. A me pan indan ria ol: Raka, pan panalan kapun. A me pan inda: Koe me pweipwei, pan lokidokila nan le en pweleko.
MAT 5:23 Ari, ma koe wa don pei jaraui om mairon, ap tamanda waja o, me ri om ol injenjued pa om.
MAT 5:24 Pwilikidi maj om mairon impan pei jaraui, ap kola kadeke ri om ol, ap kodo kapwaiada om mairon.
MAT 5:25 Madan materoki on me paliaan uk ni om ian i pon al o, pwe me palian on uk ender pnalan oni uk ren jaunkapun, a jaunkapun uk ren papa o, o koe pan lokidokila nan imaten.
MAT 5:26 Melel I indai on uk, koe jota pan ko jan waja o, koe lao kapunala lua karoj.
MAT 5:27 Komail ronadar, me a lokido: Koe der kamal!
MAT 5:28 A I indai on komail, meamen ninar li amen, pwen norok, nan a kamal on i nan monion i.
MAT 5:29 O ma pali maun en maj om kamakar uk, waikada jan o kaje jan uk, pwe a mau on uk, kijan war om en ola, jan war om pon en lokidokila nan pweleko.
MAT 5:30 O ma pali maun en pa om kamakar uk, waika jan o kaje jan uk, pwe a mau on uk, kijan war om en ola, jan war om pon en lokidokila nan pweleko.
MAT 5:31 A pil lokido: Meamen me pan kajela a paud, i en ki on i Kijin likau en kamueit.
MAT 5:32 A I indai on komail, meamen me pan kajela a paud, me jo nenek nan a kin kamal eki i; a meamen, me paudeki me lokido kilar, nan i me kamal.
MAT 5:33 Komail pil ronadar, me a loki on men kaua: Koe der kaula likam; a koe kapwaiada om kaula on Kaun o!
MAT 5:34 I indai on komail, der man kaula! Der kaukila nanlan, pwe mol en Kot;
MAT 5:35 Pil der jappa, pwe utipa; pil der Ierujalem, pweki kanim en Nanmarki lapalap.
MAT 5:36 Koe pil der kaukila mon om, pwe koe jota kak on wiada pit en mona eu, en puetepuet de tontol.
MAT 5:37 Omail kajokajoi pena en: Ei ei; jo, jo; pwe me dauli mepukat, kin tapi jan ni me jued.
MAT 5:38 Komail ronadar, me a lo kido: Por en maj en depukki por en maj; o ni pot en depukki ni pot.
MAT 5:39 A I indai on komail, komail der palian me jued. A meamen pikir uk ni pali maun en likin jap om, pil ki on i pali teio.
MAT 5:40 O meamen, me men wa uk ala ni kapun, pwen adia jan om jakit, en pil ki on i om likau pup.
MAT 5:41 O ma meamen nidinid kin uk, en ian i mail eu, koe en ian mail riau.
MAT 5:42 Kijakijai on me kin nidinid re om, o koe der jaupei jaw me poekipoeki re om!
MAT 5:43 Komail ronadar, me a lokidor: Koe en pok on men imp om ap kailonki om imwintiti!
MAT 5:44 A I indai on komail, pok on omail imwintiti kan. o kapakap kin irail me paki komail:
MAT 5:45 Pwe komail en japwilim en Jam omail, me kotikot nanlan. Pwe a kin kapwareda japwilim a katipin pon me jued o me mau kan, o kotin kamoredi katau pon me pun o me japun kan.
MAT 5:46 Pwe ma komail pok on, me kin pok on komail, da me pan katin pa ’mail? Jaunopwei jota kin wia due met?
MAT 5:47 O ma komail ranamau ri omail akan, da me komail jikiki jan me tei kan? Men liki kan jota kin wia due met?
MAT 5:48 Komail ari en unjokela dueta Jam omail, me kotikot nanlan, a unjok.
MAT 6:1 KOMAIL kalaka, pwe komail der kijakij janjal mon aramaj, pwe ren udial; pwe ede jota pwain omail ren Jam omail, me kotikot nanlan.
MAT 6:2 Ari, koe lao kijakij, ede peuk jaui mo om, duen me malaun akan kin wia nan jinakoke kan o nani al akan, pwe ren indand ren aramaj. Melel I indai on komail, re aleer arail pwain.
MAT 6:3 A koe lao kijakij, der kajale on pali main om, me pali maun om kin wiada.
MAT 6:4 Pwe om kijakij enrir; a Jam om, me kin majani waja rir, pan kotin katini uk.
MAT 6:5 Koe lao wia kapakap, koe der raj on me malaun akan, pwe re men kapakap nan jinakoke kan, o nani al akan, pwe ren janjal mon aramaj. Melel I indai on komail, re aleer arail pwain.
MAT 6:6 A koe lao wia kapakap, ko on nan om pera, a koe lao ritinidier wanim o, ap kapakap on Jam om, me kotikot waja rir, a Jam om, me kin majani waja rir, pan kotin katini uk.
MAT 6:7 Komail lao kapakap, komail depa purepur on lokaia mal, duen men liki kan, pwe re kiki on, me re pan pwai kida ar lokaia toto.
MAT 6:8 Komail ari ender dueta irail, pwe Jam omail kotin mani meakan, me mau on komail, mon omail poeki re a.
MAT 6:9 A iet duen omail pan win kapakap: Jam at, me kotikot nanlan. Mar omui en jaraui
MAT 6:10 Wei omui en pwaida. Kupur omui en wiaui jappa dueta nanlan.
MAT 6:11 Kotikido ran wet at tunol kaukaule.
MAT 6:12 Lapwa jan kit dip at, dueta kit me kin lapwada koroj, me wia dipi on kit.
MAT 6:13 Eder kaluan kit ren me katikatiamau kan, a nekid kit jan ni me jued akan,
MAT 6:14 Pwe ma komail pan makeki on aramaj dip ar akan, Jam omail nanlan pan pil makeki on komail.
MAT 6:15 A ma komail jota pan makeki on aramaj dip ar akan, nan Jam omail jota pil pan makeki on komail dip omail akan.
MAT 6:16 Komail lao kaijejol, eder maj en jan duen me malaun akan, pwe re kin kawukila maj arail, pwe aramas en likan arail kaijejol. Melel I indai on komail, re aleer arial pwain.
MAT 6:17 a koe lao kaijejol, ujor inon om o opinok.
MAT 6:18 Pwe koe dor kajale on aramaj om kaijejol, a on Jam om, mi kotikot waja rir, a Jam om, me kin majani nan waja rir, pan kotin katini uk.
MAT 6:19 Komail der ki pena omail pai kan nin jappa, waja man en mot o mir pan kawela ia, o men pirap kin weirada o pirapala.
MAT 6:20 A komail ki pena omail pai kan nanlan, waja man en mot de mir jota pan kawela, o men pirap jota kin weirada de pirapala.
MAT 6:21 Pwe waja om pai mia ia, iei waja monion om kin pil mia ia.
MAT 6:22 Por en maj iei marain en pali war. Ari, ma maj om makelekel, war om karoj pan dir en marain;
MAT 6:23 A ma maj om me jued, war om karoj pan dir en rotorot. A ma marain, me mi lol om, pan rotorot, daduen wan rotorot!
MAT 6:24 Jota amen me pan kak papa jaumaj riamen, pwe a pan kailonki amen, ap pok on me teio, de a pan kajampwaleki amen, ap mamaleki me teio. Komail jota pan kak papa Kot o mamon.
MAT 6:25 I me I indaiki on komail: Eder nononki on maur omail, me komail pan kan o me komail pan nim, pil jota on war omail, me komail pan likau kida. Pwe maur jo kajampwal jan kijin mana, o pali war jan likau?
MAT 6:26 Kalelapok on manpir pan Ian; re jote, kin kamoredi, re join kin dolun, re jota kin nak pena; ari jo, Jam omail nanlan kotin kamakamana irail; a ia duen, komail jo kajampwal jan irail?
MAT 6:27 A ij nan pun omail, ni a nonki, me pan kak uje pajan pein i ki tipon en pa eu?
MAT 6:28 O menda komail nonki likau? Kalelapok on kiop akan, me mi nan jap, duen ar kakairida. Re jota kin dodok o jota monkol pena.
MAT 6:29 A I indai on komail: Nan Jalomo ni a linan karoj jota a likau dueta apot irail.
MAT 6:30 Ari, ma iduen Kot kotin kapwataki dip, me mi nan jap, me kin mi ran wet, a lakap pan lokidokila nan kijiniai, dadue a jota pan kotin kalikauwi komail da, me pojon tikitik?
MAT 6:31 I me komail der nononki indinda: Da me je pan kan? De da me je pan nim? De da me je pan likau kida?
MAT 6:32 Pwe mepukat men liki kan kin raparapaki; pwe Jam omail nanlan kotin mani, me mepukat karoj mau on komail.
MAT 6:33 Rapaki maj wein Kot o a pun, a mepukat karoj pan poujelan komail.
MAT 6:34 Eder nonki on lakap; pwe lakap pan nonki on pein i; a itar on ran eu pein a jued.
MAT 7:1 DER kadeikada, pwe komail der pakadeikada.
MAT 7:2 Pwe duen kadeik, me komail kadeikekida aramaj, iduen komail pan pakadeikada, o duen men jon, me komail kin jonki, iduen a pil pan jon on komail,
MAT 7:3 A menda koe kilikilan diper ni maj en ri om ol, a jota kan ataut o ni maj om?
MAT 7:4 De iaduen koe pan indan ri om ol: Aui maj, i pan ki jan diper ni maj om. A kilan, ataut apot mi ni pein maj om?
MAT 7:5 Malaun amen koe, ki jan maj ataut ni maj om, koe ap pan kak kilan, duen om pan kak ki jan diper ni maj en ri om ol,
MAT 7:6 Komail der ki on kidi me jaraui kot! O omail pai kan der kajedi on mon pwik kan, pwe ren de tiak pajan, ap jaupeido nalij komail pajan.
MAT 7:7 Poeki, a komail pan tunole; rapaki, a komail pan diarada; letelet, a a pan ritida mo omail.
MAT 7:8 Pwe karoj, me poekipoeki, kin tunole; o me kin raparapaki, kin diarada; o me kin letelet, nan a pan ritida mo a.
MAT 7:9 De ij aramaj nan pun omail, ma na putak pan poeki kijin prot, pan ki on i takai eu?
MAT 7:10 De ma a poeki mam amen, pan ki on i jerpent amen?
MAT 7:11 Ari, ma komail me jon jued, ap aja, ki on noumail jeri kan kijakij mau, melel kaualap Jam omail, me kotikot nanlan, pan kotiki on, me poeki re a me mau kan.
MAT 7:12 Ari meakaroj, me komail men, aramaj en wiai on komail, i me komail en wiai on irail, pwe iei kapun o jaukop akan,
MAT 7:13 Pedelon on nan wanim tatik! Pwe wanim me walek o al me talap, me kodilan mela, o irail me toto, me kin pedelon on Waja O.
MAT 7:14 A wanim me watikitik, o al me tatik, me ko on maur o irail me malaulau, me kin diarada.
MAT 7:15 Komail kalaka jaukop likam akan, me kin pwara don komail ni likau en jip, a lole irail jon en kidi komad.
MAT 7:16 Komail pan aja kin irail ni arail wa. Pwe da, aramaj pan kak dolun jan wain ni karer, de pik jan ni tuka kamadak?
MAT 7:17 Nan iduen tuka mau karoj kin wa mau, a tuka jued kin wa jued.
MAT 7:18 Tuka mau jota kak wa jued, o tuka jued jota kak wa mau.
MAT 7:19 Ari tuka karoj, me jo wa mau pan paledi o lokidokila nuni ini.
MAT 7:20 Ari, komail pan aja kin irail ni arail wa.
MAT 7:21 Kaidin karoj, me kin kajokajoi on ia: Main, Main, pan pedelon on nan wein nanlan, a me kin wiawia kupur en Jam ai, me kotikot nanlan.
MAT 7:22 Me toto pan kajoi on ia ni ran o: Main, Main, kit, jo koko padar ni mar omiu. o ni mar omui kaujaki tewil akan, o ni mar omui wia. kidar manaman toto?
MAT 7:23 I ap pan indai on irail: I jota mail aja komail. kowei jan ia, komail me kin wiada me jued.
MAT 7:24 A meumen ronada ai padak pukut ap peiki on, I pan karajai on i ol lolokon amen, me kauada im a pon paip,
MAT 7:25 Katau lau moredi, o lakape pwilipwiledo, o an me iripokidon im o, a jota ronki pajan, pweki a kakauda im a pon paip.
MAT 7:26 O meamen ronaada ai padak pukat, ap jota kapwaiada, nan a pan rajon ol pweipwei men, me kauada im a pon pik en oror.
MAT 7:27 Katau lao moredi o lapake pwilipwilido, o an ma irepoki don im o, a ronki pajan; o a ronklaud melel,
MAT 7:28 Kadekadeo Iejuj lao kaimwijokela majan pukat, pokon o ap puriamuiki kaualap japwilim a padak o.
MAT 7:29 Pwe a kotin kawewe on irail ni manaman, a jota dueta arail jaunkawewe kan.
MAT 8:1 A LAO kotido jan nin dol o, pokon kalaimun idauendo i.
MAT 8:2 A kilan, ol tuketuk amen ap kodo poni i indada: Main, ma re kotin kupura, re pan kak on kamakele ia da.
MAT 8:3 I ari kotin kapawei lim a, jair i, majani: I men, koe en makelekel; ari, a tuketuk ap madan modi jan.
MAT 8:4 Iejuj ap kotin majani on i: Kalaka, koe de kaireki amen; a kola kajale on jamero pein uk, o kida mairon eu, me Mojej majani, pwen kadede on irail.
MAT 8:5 A lao kotilon on nan Kapernaum, jenturion amen apedon i poeki re a.
MAT 8:6 Indada: Main, ai ladu wonon nan deu a jomau kokon madak ap wairok kaualap.
MAT 8:7 Iejuj ap kotin majani on i: I pan kola kakelailada i.
MAT 8:8 Jenturion japen potoan on: Main, i jowar ren kotilon on nan im ai; a ren majani eta, ai ladu up pan kelailada,
MAT 8:9 Pwe aramaj amen nai, me mi pan mana en kaun akan, ap kaunda jaunpei kai. A ma i pan indan amen: Kowei, a pan kola, o on amen: Kodo, a pan kodo, o on ai ladu: Wiada met, a pan wiada.
MAT 8:10 Iejuj lao mani mepukat, ap kotin puriamuiki, majani on irail me idauendo: Melel I indai on komail, jon en pojon wet I jo diaradar, jota nan Ijrael.
MAT 8:11 A I indai on komail, me toto pan kodo jan maj en lan, o kapin lan, ian Apraam, o Ijaak, o Iakop ni tepel nan wein nanlan.
MAT 8:12 A me pweledan wei pan lokidokila nan rotorot liki, iei wajan maiei o teterok.
MAT 8:13 Iejuj ap kotin majani on Jenturion o: U kowei, a pan wiaui on uk duen om pojon. A ladu o ap kelailadar ni auer ota.
MAT 8:14 Iejuj lao kotilon on nan im en Petruj, ap majani, me jaulap a wonon jomau karakar.
MAT 8:15 I ari kotin jair pa a, a karakar ap ko jan. I ari pauridar papa i.
MAT 8:16 A lao jautik penaer re wa don i me toto, me tewil oko ti poa. I ari kotin kaujeki jan nen akan a majan o kakelada me jomau kan karoj.
MAT 8:17 Pwen pwaida, me lokido ren jaukop Iejaia, me majani: A kotin ale on pein i atail luet akan, o wa atail jomau kan.
MAT 8:18 Iejuj lao kotin majani aramaj toto pokon don i, ap kotin majani, ren kotela palio palilan jed O.
MAT 8:19 Jaunkawewe men ap pwara do potoan on i: Jaunpadak i pan idedauen ir waja karoj re pan kotila ia.
MAT 8:20 Iejuj kotin majani on i: Pokj akan por arail mia, o manpir en pan law paj arail mia, a Nain aramaj jota wajan kaulawei mon a.
MAT 8:21 O amen jan nan pun en japwilim a tounpadak kan potoan on i: Main re kotin mueid on ia en kola maj jarepedi ai papa.
MAT 8:22 A Iejuj kotin majani on i: Idauen ia do! Me melar akan en jarepedi pein ar melar akan.
MAT 8:23 A lao kotida pon jop o, japwilim a tounpadak kan idauenla i.
MAT 8:24 A kilan, ap onionidar nan jed, iluk kan ari kadupaledi jop o, a i kotin jaimokelar.
MAT 8:25 Japwilim a tounpadak kan ap kai don i, kaupada i, potoan on: Main, re kotin dore kit ala, kit pan mela!
MAT 8:26 A ap kotin majani on irail: Komail me pojon tikitik, da me komail majak ki? I ari kotin kipadar majani on an o jed, ap molelar kaualap.
MAT 8:27 Aramaj akan puriamuiki indada: Daduen men et, me an o jed kin peiki on?
MAT 8:28 A lao kotin lei on palio nan jap en men Kerkajin, ol riamen, me tewil oko ti poa, ap tu on i; ira kodado jan nan joujou kai, me makar kaualap, o jota me kak weid waja o.
MAT 8:29 A kilan, ira weriwer indada: Iejuj Japwilim en Kot, da me kit en wia re omui? Kom kotido kame kit mon anjau o leler?
MAT 8:30 A pwin pwik kalaimun mi kaila wei manamana jili.
MAT 8:31 Tewil oko ap poeki re a indada: Ma kom pan kauje kit ala, ap mueid on kit, en tilon nan pwin pwik o.
MAT 8:32 I ari kotin majani on irail: U ko on! Irail keredi jan, rap tilon nan pwin pwik o. A kilan, pwin pwik o tandaui, tanedi on waja ukedi nan jed, irail ari mopelar nan pil o.
MAT 8:33 Jilepa kan ap tandaui tanlon on kanim o kakaireki meakaroj, duen me wiaui on me tewil ti poa ko.
MAT 8:34 A kilan, toun kanim koiei jan pokon don Iejuj. Irail lao kilaner i, rap poeki, a en kotila jan jap arail.
MAT 9:1 I ARI kotida pon jop o, kotela pur on japwilim a kanim.
MAT 9:2 A kilan, re wa don i me jomau kokon madak, me wonon pon pet. Iejuj lao kotin majani ar pojon, ap majani on me jomau kokon madak: Nai, kaporopor mau, dip om akan me lapwadar.
MAT 9:3 A kilan, jaunkawewe kai monemoneloleki: Lap o kin lalaue.
MAT 9:4 A Iejuj lao mani arail lamelam, ap kotin, majani: Menda komail lamelam jued nan monion omail?
MAT 9:5 Pwe ia me monai ren inda: Dip om akan lapwadar! De inda: Uda aluwei?
MAT 9:6 A pwe komail en aja, me Nain aramaj me manaman on lapwada dip nin jappa iei me a kotin majanieki on me jomau kokon madak: Uda, ale ki om ko on deu om!
MAT 9:7 I ari udar, koieilar deu a.
MAT 9:8 Pokon lao kilaner mepukat, rap malamalauak kila kapina Kot, me kotiki on aramaj manaman due met.
MAT 9:9 Iejuj lao kotiwei jan waja o, ap majani aramaj amen, me ad a Matauj, me momod nan deun nopwei, ap kotin majani on i: Idauen ia do! I ari uda idauenla i.
MAT 9:10 Kadekadeo a lao kaipokedi konot nan im o, kilan jaunopwei o me dipan me toto ian Iejuj o japwilim a tounpadak kan konokonot.
MAT 9:11 Parijar akan lao kilaner met, ap indan japwilim a tounpadak kan: Da me omail Jaunpadak ianki jaunopwei o me dipan akan konokonot?
MAT 9:12 Iejuj lao mani mepukat, ap kotin majani: Me kelail akan jota mau on jaunwini, pwe me jomau eta.
MAT 9:13 A komail kola, padakki wewen kajoi pot et: I kin polauleki kadek a kaidin mairon ijij. I kodon eker don kalula me dipan akan, a kaidin me pun kan.
MAT 9:14 En Ioanej a tounpadak kan ap pwara don re a potoan on: Da me kit o Parijar akan kin kaijejol pan pak toto, a japwilim omui tounpadak kan jota kin kaijejol?
MAT 9:15 Iejuj ap kotin majani on irail: Da, toun kamadip en kapapaud pan kak kamauk ni anjau ol kamot mi re ’rail? A kadekadeo eu ran ol kamod pan peukawei jan irail, re ap pan kaijejol.
MAT 9:16 Jota amen me kin deipinaki likau kap likau marin, pwe me depin a pan teirok jan likau o, a por o pan laudela. ioa.
MAT 9:17 Pil jota amen me kin kodie on wain kap nan ed marin, a ma ei ed akan pan ola, a wain pan wudokela, o ed akan pan ola. A re kin kodie on wain kap nan ed kap, ira karoj ap nekinek man
MAT 9:18 Ni a kotin majani on irail mepukat, kilan jaupeidi amen ap pedelon, poridi on i potoan on: Nai jeripein apton melar, a ren kotido, pwil po a lim ar, a ap pan maureda.
MAT 9:19 Iejuj ari kotida idauenla i, o japwilim a tounpadak kan pil ian.
MAT 9:20 A kilan, li amen, me nta pwilipwil par naulriau, a kai on pon palikia o jair imwin japwilim a likau.
MAT 9:21 Pwe a lamelame: Ma i doke japwilim a likau, i pan kelailada.
MAT 9:22 A Iejuj kotin jaupeila; a lao majani i, ap kotin majani: Jeripein kaporopor mau, om pojon me kakelail uk ada. A lio kelailadar ni auer ota.
MAT 9:23 A Iejuj lao kotilon on nan im en jaupeidi o, ap majani jaunkajan o moromoron en aramaj akan,
MAT 9:24 Ap kotin majani: Kowei san, pwe jeripein en jota melar, pwe a mamair. Irail ap kaurureki
MAT 9:25 Aramaj akan lao kokok jan, i ap kotilon on, ale pa a, jeripein ap paurida.
MAT 9:26 Mepukat ap lolok jili nan jap karoj.
MAT 9:27 Iejuj lao kotila jan waja o, ol majkun riamen idauenla i, weriwer indada: Kupura kit, Komui japwilim en Dawid!
MAT 9:28 A Iau kotilon on nan im o, me majkun ko ap ko don i. Iejuj ari majani ira: Koma kamelele me I kak on wiada met? Ira patoan on: Ei Main.
MAT 9:29 I ap kotin jair maj ara majani: Duen oma pojon a pan wiaui on koma.
MAT 9:30 Maj ara ari pad pajan. Iejuj ap kotin kalik ira di majani: Kalaka, pwe meamen de aja?
MAT 9:31 A ira koieilar katiti jili ni jap karoj.
MAT 9:32 Ira lao koieilar, kilan, irail ap wa don i aramaj amen, me loton o tewil ti poa.
MAT 9:33 Tewil lao pakauja jan, me loton o ap lokaia; pokon o ap malamalauak kila indada: Nan dueta met a jaikenta wiauier nan Ijrael.
MAT 9:34 A Parijar indada: Nan jaumaj en tewil akan me a kaujaki jan tewil akan.
MAT 9:35 Iejuj ap kotin kakan jili nan kanim laud o me tikitik kan kawewe nan ar jinakoke kan o padapadaki ronamau en wei, o kotin kakelada jon en jomau o luet akan karoj.
MAT 9:36 A lao majani pokon o, ap kotin kupuro kin irail, pwe irail joanianalar o dupokalar dueta jip akan, me jota jile parail.
MAT 9:37 I ap kotin majani on japwilim a tounpadak kan: Nan melel rak me kalaimun, a men dodok me malaulau.
MAT 9:38 Komail ari poeki ren Kaun en rak, en kadarala toun dodok kan nan a rak.
MAT 10:1 A LAO kotin molipe penaer japwilim a tounpadak ekriamen ap kotiki on irail manaman, en poedi nen jaut akan, pwen kauj ir wei o kamauiala jon en jomau o luet karoj.
MAT 10:2 A iet mar en wanporon ekriamen: Men maj Jimon, me maraneki Petruj, o ri a Andreaj, o lakopuj nain Jepedauj, o ri a loanej;
MAT 10:3 Pilipuj o Partolomauj, Tomaj o Matauj jaunopwei men, Iakopuj nain Alpauj, Lepauj, me pil adaneki Tadauj;
MAT 10:4 Jimon men Kana o Iudaj Ijkariot men panala i.
MAT 10:5 Ekriamen pukat, me Iejuj kotin poronela, kotiki on irail kujoned eu majani: Komail der weweid nani al en men liki kan o der pedelon on nan kanim en Jamaria.
MAT 10:6 A kola ren jip akan en jaun Ijrael, me jalonalar
MAT 10:7 A in omail kokola komail padapadak indada: Wein nan lan korendor.
MAT 10:8 Kakeada me jomau kan, o kamauroda, me melar akan, kamakelekeleda, me tuketuk kan, o kauje wei tewil akan; a duen komail aleer ni tiak en kijakij, iduen komail pan kijakij weita.
MAT 10:9 Komail der wewa kold, de jilper, de mata nan omail ed akan.
MAT 10:10 Pil der ed en jailok, de jakit riau, de jut, de jokon, pwe toundodok me war on kan a kijin mana.
MAT 10:11 A ma komail pan pedelon on nan kanim laud de tikitik eu, raparapaki, ma meamen mi lole, me war on; ari, komail pan mondi re a, lao komail pan ko wei jan.
MAT 10:12 A ma komail pan pedelon on nan im o, komail pan ranamau on tou a kan.
MAT 10:13 O ma re war on, omail popol pan ko on irail; a ma re jowar, omail popol pan pure don komail.
MAT 10:14 A waja kij meamen jota pan kajamo komail, de jota men ron omail padak, komail ari pedoi jan nan im o de kanim, ap jepede jan pwel ni na omail.
MAT 10:15 Melel I indai on komail, nan a pan monai on jap en Jodom o Komora ni ran en kadeik o jan kanim o.
MAT 10:16 Kilan I kadar komail la duete jip akan nan pun en kidi en wel: komail ari lolekon dueta jerpent, a tiak mau dueta muroi.
MAT 10:17 Perki aramaj, pwe re pan panalan komail kapun kan, o re pan kame komail nan ar jinakoke kan.
MAT 10:18 O Komail pan wijike won kaun o nanmarki kai pweki nai, pwen kadede on irail, o on men liki kan.
MAT 10:19 Irail lao panala komail, ede madamadaua duen tiak en omail pan lokaia; pwe a pan ko on komail, ni auer o me komail pan inda.
MAT 10:20 Pwe kaidin komail, me lokaia, a Nen en Jam omail, me pan kalokaia komail.
MAT 10:21 A pirien eu, amen pan panala amen, pwen kamela, a jam na jeri, a jeri ko pan u on ar papa o nono, o jauaja, pwe ira on kamela.
MAT 10:22 O komail pan tantat ren aramaj karoj pweki ad ai; a me pan dadaurata, lei imwi i me pan dorola.
MAT 10:23 A ma re pan kame komail nan eu kanim, komail ari tanala nan eu. Pwe melel I indai on komail, komail jota pan kanikiala kanim en Ijrael karoj, Nain aramaj lao pwarador.?
MAT 10:24 Tounpadak jota kin laude jan a jaunpadak, de ladu laude jan a monjap.
MAT 10:25 A itar on tounpadak, en paroki on a jaunpadak o ladu dueta a monjap. Ma re kaadaneki kaun en im o Peeljepup, nan melel kaualap, re pil pan wiai on toun im akan dueta.
MAT 10:26 Komail ari der majak irail, pwe jota me rir kot, me jo pan janjaleda, o me okiok, me jo pan kadiarokad
MAT 10:27 Me I indai on komail nan rotorot, i me komail katiti nan marain; o me pan ko on nan jalon omail, i me komail pan kalok jili pon im akan.
MAT 10:28 Komail der majak irail, me kin kemela pali war, ap jota kak on kamela pali nen. A komail majak melel i, me kak on kajopokela pali war o nen nan pweleko.
MAT 10:29 Jiok riamen jota kin netila ni denar eu? Ari jo, jota amen ira pan pupedi nan pwel, ma jota pwilijan Jam omail.
MAT 10:30 Ari pit en mon? omail karoj me wadawad penaer.
MAT 10:31 Komail ari der majak, pwe komail me mau jan jiok toto.
MAT 10:32 Meamen pan ponaja ia mon aramaj, nan i me I pan ponaja ren Jam ai me ketiket, nanlan.
MAT 10:33 A meamen ponjaja ia mon aramaj nan i me I pil pan ponjaja ren Jam ai, me ketiket nanlan.
MAT 10:34 Eder kiki on, me Ikodon kamuei maula jappa; kaidin muei mau, me I kokido, a kodlaj pot.
MAT 10:35 Pwe I kodon kaliak toror pajan aramaj on jam a, o jeripein on in a, a li o on en a paud a nono.
MAT 10:36 O pein toun im en aramaj amen pan a imwintiti.
MAT 10:37 Me pok on jam de in a lapa jan a pok on ia, nan a jowar ia. O me pok on na putak de jeripein lapa jan a pok on ia, nan a jowar ia.
MAT 10:38 A me jo ale a lopu o idauen ia do, nan a jowar ia.
MAT 10:39 Me pan diar maur, i me pan katia jan, a me kajela maur a pweki nai, i me pan diarada.
MAT 10:40 Meamen kajamo komail, kin kajamo ia, a me kin kajamo ia, nan a kin kajamo i, me kadar ia do.
MAT 10:41 Meamen kajamo jaukop amen ni mar en jaukop, pan ale pwain en jaukop amen. Me kajamo pun amen ni mar en me pun amen pan ale pwain en me pun amen.
MAT 10:42 O meamen pan ki on dal en pil lamelamur eu, pwe amen tikitik pukat en nim, ni mar en tounpadak amen, melel I indai on komail, a jota pan katia jan pwain a.
MAT 11:1 KADEKADEO Iejuj lao kaimwijokela a majan on japwilim a tounpadak ekriamen, ap kotila jan waja o, pwen kaukawewe o padapadak nan ar kanim akan.
MAT 11:2 A Ioaneij lan roner nan imaten wiawian Krijtuj, ap poronela a tounpadak kai.
MAT 11:3 Kalelapok re a: Ir me pan kotido, de jen auiaui amen?
MAT 11:4 Iejuj kotin japen majani on irail: Komail kowei kaireki Ioanej, me komail ron o kilan:
MAT 11:5 Me majkun akan kin kilan waja, o me danidan kan kin alu, o me tuketuk kan kin makeladar, o me jalonepon kan kin ron waja, o me melar akan kin maureda, o ronamau kin loloki on me jamama kan.
MAT 11:6 O meid pai, me jota pan makar kin ia.
MAT 11:7 Mepukat lao kokola, Iejuj ap kotin tapiadar mamajani on pokon o duen Ioanej: Da me komail koieila en kilan nan jap tan? Alek pot, me kin duedualokki an?
MAT 11:8 De da me komail koieila en kilan? Aramaj amen nan likau muterok? Kilan, me kin likau kida likau muterok, kin mi nan im en nanmarki kan.
MAT 11:9 De da me komail koieila en kilan? Jaukop amen? Ei I indai on komail a laude jan jaukop amen.
MAT 11:10 Pwe iei i, me intinidier: Kilan I kadarala mo ’mui ai men kadar, me pan koko al mo ’mui.
MAT 11:11 Melel I indai on komail, jota me ipwidi jan ren li akan, me laude jan Ioanej jaunpaptaij. Ari jo, me tikitik nan wein nanlan, iei me laude jan i.
MAT 11:12 A jan ni muein Ioanej jaunpaptaij kokodo lei met wein nanlan kokido eta manaman, ari me manaman akan kin koledi on irail.
MAT 11:13 Pwe jaukop karoj o kapun kokopadar lao lei Ioanej.
MAT 11:14 O ma komail men duki on, nan iei Eliaj, me pan kodo.
MAT 11:15 Me jalon a mia, men ron, i en ron!
MAT 11:16 A da me I en karajai on di wet? A raj on jeri kan, me kin momod nan wajan net akan o likelikwir on kij arail,
MAT 11:17 Indada: Kit kajan on komail, a komail, jota kakalek; kit kauleki on komail kaul en mamauk, a komail jota janejan.
MAT 11:18 Pwe Ioanej pwarado, ap jota kan o nim, a re kin inda: Nan tewil kin ti poa.
MAT 11:19 Nain aramaj pwarado, manamana o nim, a re kin inda: Kilan, me kaped en mana o kamom jakau, kompoke pan jaunopwei o me dipan akan, a lolekon o kin diarok kida na jeri ko.
MAT 11:20 A kotin tapiada kidaueda kanim akan, me a wiai oner manaman to to, aki re jota kalula:
MAT 11:21 Juedi on uk Korajin! Juedi ON uk Petjaida! Pwe ma manaman akan, me wiaui on uk er, wiauier on Tiruj o Jidon, nan melel re pan pitipit kalula nan tuk en likau o nan paj.
MAT 11:22 A I indai on komail, a pan monai on Tiruj o Jidon ni ran en kadeik jan komail.
MAT 11:23 A koe Kapernaum, me paidar lel nanlan, pan pijikindi nun pweleko; pwe ma manaman akan, me wiaui on uk er, wiauier on Jodom, nan a pan mimieta lau lel ran wet.
MAT 11:24 A I indai on komail, a pan monai on jap en Jodom ni ran mi kadeik jan koe.
MAT 11:25 Ni anjau ota Iejuj kotin tapiadar majani: I kapina komui Jam, Kaun pan lan o jappa, me komui okila mepukat jan me lolekon o koiok kan, ap kajale on jeri pwelel akan.
MAT 11:26 Ei Jam ai, pwe iduen me komui kupukupura.
MAT 11:27 Meakaroj muei on ia er jan ren Jam ai, o jota amen, me aja japwilim a Ol, pwe Jam eta, o jota amen, me aja Jam, pwe japwilim a Ol eta, o me japwilim a Ol pan kajale on.
MAT 11:28 Komail karoj, me panadar o toutoular kodo re i I pan kamolielei komail la.
MAT 11:29 Ale on komail ai iok, o padakki jan ia; pwe Nai me opampap o karakarak melel, komail ari pan diarada kamol pan nen omail.
MAT 11:30 Pwe ai iok me manai, o katoutou pai me marara.
MAT 12:1 I anjau o Iejuj kotila nan mat en korn ni ran en japat, a sapwelim a a tounpadak kan men manadar, rap doluna jan wan korn o Kankan.
MAT 12:2 Parijar lau kilaner mepwukat, rap patoan on i: Majani, japwilim omui tounpadak kan kin wiada, me jota pun, en wiaui ni ran en japat.
MAT 12:3 A kotin majani on irail: kumail jota doropwe, me Dawid wiadar ni a o ian akan men manadar?
MAT 12:4 Duen a pedelon on nan im en Kot o Kankan prot en kajanjal, me jota pun, I o ian akan en kan, pwe jamero akan eta.
MAT 12:5 De komail jota wadoker nan kapun o, duen jamero akan ar kin kaupali ran en japat nan im en kaudok ni ran en japat, ap jota dip arail?
MAT 12:6 A I indai on komail, i, me laude jan im en kaudok, mi waja kij et.
MAT 12:7 A ma komail pan aja wewen kajoi pot et: I kin polauleki kadek a kaidin mairon ijij, komail jota pan kadeikada me makelekel akan.
MAT 12:8 Pwe nain aramaj pil udan Kaun en japat.
MAT 12:9 A kotila jan waja o, ap kotilon on nan ar jinakoke.
MAT 12:10 A kilan, aramaj amen mia, me pa a motorlar. Irail idok re a indada: Me pun, en kakelailada ni ran en japat? Pwe ren kadipa i.
MAT 12:11 I ari kotin majani on irail: Ij aramaj nan pun omail, me na jip amen mia, ma a pupedi on nan por ni ran en japat, a jo pan poridi on, kida jan?
MAT 12:12 A iaduen aramaj amen jota kajampwal kaualap jan jip amen? I me aramaj amen kak wia kida me mau ni ran en japat.
MAT 12:13 I ap kotin majani on aramaj o: Kapa wei pa om! I ari kapa wei, ap maular dueta pali teio.
MAT 12:14 Parijar ap pedoi jan o kapukapun pena, duen ar pan kamatala i.
MAT 12:15 Iejuj lao mani met, ap kotila jan waja o, a pokon kalaimun idauenla i; i ari kakelailadar irail karoj.
MAT 12:16 O majani on irail, ren der kalok jili i.
MAT 12:17 Pwen pwaida, me lokido ren jaukop Iejaia, me majani:
MAT 12:18 Kilan, i ai ladu, me I piladar, o kompokepa i, me I kin polaule kida. I pan aude kin i Nen i, o a pan kajale on men liki kan duen kadeik o.
MAT 12:19 Nan a jota pan akamai de weriwer, o jota amen me pan ron nil a pon al akan,
MAT 12:20 A jota pan katip pajan alek luet o, o a jota pan kakundi wik inkinkon o, lao a pan kaimwijokala kadeik o.
MAT 12:21 O men liki kun pan kaporoporoki mar a.
MAT 12:22 Me tewil ti poa men, me majkun o loton ap wijike don i; I ari kakelailada i, a me majkun o loton ap lokaia o kilan waja.
MAT 12:23 Aramaj karoj ap malamalauak kila indada: Kaidin i japwilim en Dawid?
MAT 12:24 A Parijar akan lao ronadar, rap indada: Nan jota, me lap en kaujeki wei tewil akan, Peelje pup eta, jaumaj en tewil akan.
MAT 12:25 I ari ani ar lamelam majani on irail: Wei karoj, ma tou a kan pan u pena nan pun ar, a pan ola, o ma toun kanim de toun im eu pan u pena nan pun ar, a jota pan pwaida.
MAT 12:26 O ma Jatan pan kauje wei Jatan, a pan u on pein i, a iaduen a wei pan kak pwaida?
MAT 12:27 Ma I kin kaujeki wei Peeljepup tewil akan, a ij me noumail jeri kan kin kauje kin irail? Irail ari pan omail jaunkapun.
MAT 12:28 A ma I kaujaki wei Nen en Kot tewil akan, nan wein Kot lel on komail er.
MAT 12:29 De iaduen, ij me pan kak kolon on nan im en me kelail amen, kulia jan a kapwa, ma a jo jaliedi maj me kelail o? A ap pan kak kulia jan a kapwa.
MAT 12:30 Meamen me jota ian ia, iei me palian ia; o me jota kin dolun penan ia, iei me kin kajapoka pajan.
MAT 12:31 I me Nai indai on komail, dip karoj o lalaue pan kak lapwa jan aramaj, a lalaue on Nen jota pan lapwa jan aramaj.
MAT 12:32 O me pan lalaue Nain aramaj, a pan lapwa jan i; a me pan lalaue Nen jaraui, a jota pan lapwa jan i, jota nan muei met pil jota nan muei kokodo.
MAT 12:33 Padukedi tuka mau pot, a wa pan mau; de padukedi tuka jued apot, a wa pan jued. Pwe tuka kin diarok kida wa.
MAT 12:34 Wan jerpent komail, iaduen komail kak lokaia mau, pwe komail me jued? Pwe aua kin lokaia jan nan audepan monion o.
MAT 12:35 Aramaj mau kin kida me mau jan nan pai mau en monion i, a aramaj jued kin kida me jued jan nan pai jued en monion i.
MAT 12:36 A I indai on komail, lokaia mal karoj, me aramaj inda, pan puk on ir ni ran en kadeik o.
MAT 12:37 Pwe jan ni om kajokajoi koe pan kapun kila, o jan ni om kajokajoi koe pan pakadeikada.
MAT 12:38 Jaunkawewe o Parijar kui ap japen i indada: Jaunpadak, je men kilan kilel eu jan re omui
MAT 12:39 A i me kotin japen majani on irail: Di jued o kamal o kin rapaki kilel eu, a jota kilel eu, me pan janjal on irail, pwe kilel en jaukop Iona eta.
MAT 12:40 Pwe duen Iona a mimi nan kaped en mam kalaimun amen ran jilu o pon jili pon, iduen Nain aramaj pan mimi nan monion en jappa ran jilu o pon jili pon.
MAT 12:41 Ol en Niniwekan pan u on di wet ni kadeik lapalap o pan kadeikada, pwe re kalula ni ar ronadar padak en Iona, a kilan, me laude jan Iona mi met.
MAT 12:42 Li nanmarki en pali air amen pan u on di wet ni kadeik lapalap o pan kadeikada; pwe a pwurado jan ni imwin jappa, pwen ron lolekon en Jalomo. A kilan me laude jan Jalomo mi met.
MAT 12:43 Nen jaut lao kowei jan ren aramaj o, a kin tanata jili nan jap tan akan, rapaki wajan kamol, a jota, me a diarada.
MAT 12:44 I ap kin inda: I pan purelon nan im ai, me i pedoi janer. A lau puredo, a diar me a tan, kokok, o kapwater.
MAT 12:45 I ari mi koieila, ale on i nen ijimen jued jan pein i; irail Iau pedelon on lole, rap kaukauson ia, a aramaj pan jued jan maj. Iduen a pan wiaui on di jued wet
MAT 12:46 A ni a kotin majani pokon o mepwukat, kilan, in a o ri a ol akan u liki, re men lokaia on i.
MAT 12:47 Amen ap potoan on i: Re kotin mani, in ar o ri ar ol akan mimi liki o men lokaia on ir.
MAT 12:48 A a kotin japen majani on, me kaireki on i: Ij in ai o ir ri ai ol akan?
MAT 12:49 Ap kotin kapawei lim a pon japwilim a tounpadak kan majani: Kilan, in ai o ri ai ol pukat!
MAT 12:50 Pwe meamen, me kin wia kupur en Jam ai, me kotikot nanlan, nan i me ri ai ol, o ri
MAT 13:1 NI ran ota Iejuj kotila jan nan im o, ap kaipokedi ponoror.
MAT 13:2 A pokon kalaimun pokon don i, i ari kotidan pon jop pot, kaipokedi, a pokon o udar pon oror o.
MAT 13:3 I ari karajerajeki on me toto majani: Kilan, jaunkamor o kolan kamorok.
MAT 13:4 Ni a kamokamorok, akai ap moredier on pon kailan al, manpir ap pirido nam ir ala.
MAT 13:5 A akai moredier waja takain, waja pwel pedeped; ir ari pitipit wojadar pweki jota pwel lole.
MAT 13:6 A katipin lao dakaradar, re motoredier o monelar, pweki jota kalau ar.
MAT 13:7 A akai moredier nan tuka teketek; a tuka teketek wojadar kajoka ir ala.
MAT 13:8 A akai moredier nan pwel mau o wadar: Akai pan me epuki, akai me woneijok, akai me jileijok.
MAT 13:9 Me jalon a mia, men ron, i en ron!
MAT 13:10 Tounpadak kan ap pwarado potoan on i: Da me re kotin kaukawewe on irail ni karajeraj akan?
MAT 13:11 A kotin japen majani on irail: A muei on komail er, en aja, me rir en wein nanlan, a ap jota muei on mepukat.
MAT 13:12 Pwe me a. mia, ekij pan ko on, pwen aneki me land; a me jota a mia, nan a pan katia jan, me mi re a.
MAT 13:13 I me I padaki on irail ni karajeraj. Pwe re kilan waja, ap jota kin kilan, o ron waja, ap jota kin ron, pwe re jota kin dedeki.
MAT 13:14 Nan irail kapun pan kokop en Iejaia, me majanier: Komail pan ronki jalon omail, ap jota dedeki, o kilanki maj omail, ap jota weweki.
MAT 13:15 Pwe monion en aramaj pukat kapitakailar, o jalon arail ponlar, o re kamair pena maj arail. Pwe kadekadeo re de kilanki maj arail, o ronki jalon arail, o lolokonki monion arail, o wukila, a I de kakel irail ada.
MAT 13:16 A maj omail meid pai, pwe re kilan waja, o jalon omail, pwe re ron waja.
MAT 13:17 Pwe melel I indai on komail, jaukop o me pun akan me toto, me anane en kilan, me komail kin kilekilan, ap jota kilaner, o en ron, me komail kin roneron, a re jota ronadar.
MAT 13:18 Komail ari ron karajepa wet duen jaunkamorok:
MAT 13:19 Meamen ron majan duen wei o ap jota dedeki, me jued ap pwarado, katia jan, me kamoremoredier nan monion i, a iei i, me ale war akan pon kailan al o.
MAT 13:20 A me kamoremoredier waja takain, iei i, me kin ronada majan o, ap pitipit peren kida ale;
MAT 13:21 A jota kalau a re a, pwe a lol majaran, pwe anjau apwal o kamekam lao pwaida pweki majan o, a ap madan makar kida.
MAT 13:22 A me kamoremoredi on nan tuka teketek, iei i, me kin ronada majan o, a anan en pai en jappa o widin en dipijou kan kin kajokela majan o, ap jo wa.
MAT 13:23 A me kamoremoredi nan pwel mau, iei i, me kin ronada majan o, ap dedeki o wada; akai kin pan me epuki, a akai me woneijok, a akai jileijok.
MAT 13:24 A kotiki on irail er pil apot karajeraj majani: Wein nanlan rajon aramaj amen, me kamoredi war mau nan japwe.
MAT 13:25 A aramaj lao mairelar, a imwintiti ap pwarado kamoredier dip nan pun en korn ap koieila.
MAT 13:26 A tuka lao wojadar o wadar, dip ap pil pwaradar.
MAT 13:27 Ladu en kaun pan im o kan ap pwara don i potoan on i: Main, kaidin war mau, me kom kotin kamoredier nan jap omui? A iaduen dip, a ko jan ia?
MAT 13:28 A majani on irail: Aramaj mor jued amen me wiadar. Ladu kan ap potoan on i: Kom kotin mauki, jen kola matiada jan?
MAT 13:29 A majani: Iermen, pwe komail der matia jan dip ianaki korn.
MAT 13:30 A karoj pan mimieta lao anjaun rak; ni anjaun rak i pan indan men dolun kan: Ki pena maj dip akan, pira pena ni kap akan, pwe aramaj en karonala, a korn ki pena nan ai im en nak.
MAT 13:31 A kotiki on irail pil apot karajeraj majani: Wein nanlan rajon wan tuka eu, me aramaj amen ale, padukedi on nan japwe,
MAT 13:32 Me tikitik jan war karoj, a a lao wojada, a kalaimun jan dip akan, o wiala tuka laud apot, manpir en pan lan akan ap pokon pena o mimi nan ra a kan.
MAT 13:33 A pil apot karajeraj me a kotin majani on irail: Wein nanlan raj on kalep kij, me li amen ale okila nan kajak en plaua jilu, Karoj lao mutala.
MAT 13:34 Mepukat karoj Iejuj kotin padapadanki ni karajeraj on pokon o, o jota, me a kotin padaki on irail, ma jota ni karajeraj.
MAT 13:35 Pwen pwaida me lokido ren jaukop o, me majani: I pan ki pajan au ai, pwen karajeraj o pan kasanjaleda me rir akan jan ni tapin kaua.
MAT 13:36 A ap kotin kadar pajan pokon o, kotilon on nan tanpaj o. Japwilim a tounpadak kan ap kai don i potoan on: Re kotin kawewe on kit karajepan dip nan mutual o.
MAT 13:37 A kotin japen majani: Me kamoredi war mau, iei Nain aramaj.
MAT 13:38 Matuel iei jappa. War mau iei toun wei. Dip iei nain mejued.
MAT 13:39 Imwintiti, me kin kamor ir edi, iei tewil. Rak me kaimwijoke pan jappa. Jaundolun pene iei tounlan kan.
MAT 13:40 A duen dip akan a kin uja jan ron kila kijiniai, iduen a pan wiaui ni imwin kaua.
MAT 13:41 Nain aramaj pan kadarala na tounlan kan, o re pan kijan nan wei men kamakar karoj, o me kin wiawia me jued.
MAT 13:42 O re pan kajapok ir alan Ien kijiniai iei wajan mamaiei o teterok.
MAT 13:43 Me pun kan ap pan linalin dueta katipin nan wein Jam arail. Me jalon a mia, men ron, i en ron!
MAT 13:44 Wein nanlan rajon pai eu, me rir nan matuel, me aramaj amen diaradar ap okila, o peren kida, koieila, netikilar karoj, me a naineki, ap netiadar matuel o.
MAT 13:45 Wein nanlan pil rajon jaunet amen, me raparapaki takai kajampwal kai.
MAT 13:46 A lao diaradar eu, me kajampwalia, ap koieila netikilar a dipijou karoj, netiada i.
MAT 13:47 Wein nanlan pil rajon uk apot, me kin kadudi nan jed, pwen oro pena jon karoj.
MAT 13:48 A lao direla, re kin apiadado pon oror, ap mondi pena, deuk on me mau akan nan dal akan, a me jued akan re kin kajela.
MAT 13:49 Nan iduen a pan wiaui ni imwin kaua: Tounlan kan pan koieila, katoror jan me jued akan me pun kan.
MAT 13:50 O kajapok ir alan len kijiniai, iei wajan maiei o teterok.
MAT 13:51 Iejuj kotin majani on irail: Komail weweki mepukat karoj? Re potoan on: Ei Main.
MAT 13:52 A ap kotin majani on irail: I me jaunkawewe karoj, me jukujukuleki wein nanlan me rajon kaun pan im eu, me kin kapwareda jan a pai me kap o me marin.
MAT 13:53 Kadekadeo Iejuj lao kaimwijokela karajeraj pukat, ap kotin koieila jan waja o.
MAT 13:54 A koti don udan japwe kawewe on irail nan ar jinakoke. Irail ari puriamui kila indada: Lolekon en ol men et o a manaman akan ko jan ia?
MAT 13:55 Kaidin i nain kapenta? In a jota adaneki Maria? O ri a ol akan Iakop, o Iojep, o Jimon, o Iudaj?
MAT 13:56 O ri a li akan, kaidin irail karoj mi re atail? Ari, ia waja mepukat ko jan.
MAT 13:57 O irail makar kin i. A Iejuj kotin majani on irail: Jota waja me jaukop jo waui ia, nan japwe ota o ren jau i ko.
MAT 13:58 I ari jota wiadar manaman toto waja o pweki ar jopojon.
MAT 14:1 DOKAN nanmarki Erodej roner duen wiawia en Iejuj.
MAT 14:2 Ap majani on japwilim a ladu kan: Nan i Ioanej jaunpaptaij, a mauredar jan ren me melar akan, i me a wia kida manaman pukat.
MAT 14:3 Pwe Erodej koledier Ioanej o jaliedier on nan imaten pweki Erodiaj en ri a Pilip a paud.
MAT 14:4 Pwe Ioanej me majani on i: A jota muei on komui en ale i.
MAT 14:5 O a men kamela i, a a majak aramaj akan, pwe re wiakin i jaukop amen.
MAT 14:6 A en Erodej a ran en ipwidi wiauier, nain Erodiaj jeripein ap kakalek mo ’rail, i me Erodej peren kidar.
MAT 14:7 I ari inauki on i, me a pan ki on i, meakaroj, me a pan poeki, ap kotin kaula,
MAT 14:8 A lao pwili jan in a, ap potoan on: Kotiki don ia monan Ioanej jaunpaptaij pon dal wet.
MAT 14:9 Nanmarki ap kupur juedelar; a pweki a kaula o pweki irail, me ian i kot ni tepel o, a majani ren ki on i.
MAT 14:10 I ari poronelar en lepuk jan manan Ioanej nan imaten.
MAT 14:11 Mona ap wijikedor pon dal eu, ap panalan jeripein o, i ap wala ren in a.
MAT 14:12 A tounpadak kan ap pwarador, ale kalep a, jarepedier, rap kola kaireki Iejuj.
MAT 14:13 Iejuj lao mani mepukat, ap kotin iawalar jop pot, kotilan jap tan eu. Pokon lao ronadar, rap idauenla i japajapal jan nan kanim akan.
MAT 14:14 A lao kotila jan waja o, ap kotin majani pokon kalaimun, ap kupuro kin ir ala, o kotin kakelada, me jomau re ’rail.
MAT 14:15 A lao jautik penaer japwilim a tounpadak kan kaidon i potoan on: Jap tan eu met o anjau daulier; re kotin kadar pajan pokon o, pwe ren kola nan kanim akan, netiada kan ar mana.
MAT 14:16 A Iejuj kotin majani on irail: Jota kare pan ar kola, komail pan katunole irail.
MAT 14:17 A irail potoan on i: Jota at tunol met, lopon en prot eta limau o mam eta riamen.
MAT 14:18 A a kotin majani: Wa don ia!
MAT 14:19 A ap kotin majani, pokon en mondi nan ra, ap kotikida lopon en prot limau o mam riamen, ap kotin majanda nanlan, laolao ki pilitiki pajan o kotiki on tounpadak kan lopon en prot oko a tounpadak kan ap nek on pokon o.
MAT 14:20 Irail karoj ari mana o medier; rap deuk pena kopou en maremor eijok riau luan kamadip o.
MAT 14:21 A irail, me manaer, me ol limekid a li o jeri kan jota ian wadawader.
MAT 14:22 A ap kotin pain tounpadak kan, ren keredi pon jop pot, pwe ren madan wei mo a lel palio, lao a pan kotin kadar pajan pokon o.
MAT 14:23 A lao kotin kadar pajan ponkon o, ap kotin kelepelar pon nana eu, pwen laolao. A lao, Jautik penaer i eta, me kotikot waja o.
MAT 14:24 A jop o mi ni ailepan jed o lujilujeki iluk kan pwe an udo jan moa.
MAT 14:25 A kadekadeo nan lukepan pon Iejuj ap kotikot ko don irail pon jed o.
MAT 14:26 A tounpadak kan lao kilaner ikotikot jili pon jed o, ap majapwekadar indada: Ani amen! Irail ap weriwer pweki ar majak.
MAT 14:27 A Iejuj kotin madan kajoi on irail majani: Kaporopor mau, pwe Nai met, der majak.
MAT 14:28 A Petruj japen I patoan on: Main, ma ir, re kotin majan don ia, ie en kowei re ir pon pil o.
MAT 14:29 A ap kotin majani: Ukedo! Petrus ap keredier jan nan jop o, weweid pon pil o, pwen kola ren Iejuj.
MAT 14:30 A lau kilaner an ma, ap majapwekadar, a ni a pan kirila, a weriwer indada: Main kupwura ia!
MAT 14:31 Iejuj kotin madan kapawei lim a koledi i, majani on i: O koe meid pojon tikitik da me koe jo pojonki?
MAT 14:32 Ira lao kotidar pon jop o an ap moledier.
MAT 14:33 A toun jop o ap kaion i, poridier potoan on: Melel ir me Japwilim en Kot!
MAT 14:34 Irail lao kotin kotela, rap kotilan jap Kenejaret.
MAT 14:35 Toun jap o lao aja i, rap kadar jili waja karoj, o re wa don i me jomau kan karoj,
MAT 14:36 O poeki re a, ren potoan jair ta imwin japwilim a likau. A karoj, me jair i kelailadar melel.
MAT 15:1 PARIJAR o jaunkawewe kan ap ko don i jan Ierujalem, kalelapok re a:
MAT 15:2 Menda japwilim omui tounpadak kan tiakedi padok en kaua ko? Pwe re jota kin omiom ni ar pan kan prot.
MAT 15:3 A i kotin japen majani on irail: Menda komail pil tiakedi kujoned en Kot pweki omail padok kan?
MAT 15:4 Pwe Kot kotin kujonedadar majanier: Kakaki jam om o in om, o meamen lalaue jam a de in a, i en kamela.
MAT 15:5 A komail kin inda: Meamen indan jam a o in a: Korpan, iet wewe: Mairon eu, me koe men aneki jan ia; komail inda, dene jota dip a; i ari jota pan kakaki jam a o in a.
MAT 15:6 Iduen omail tiakedi kujoned en Kot pweki omail padok kan.
MAT 15:7 Malaun akan komail, nan melel, me Iejaia kokopadar iran komail, ni a majani:
MAT 15:8 Aramaj pukat kin kaka kin ia au arail, a monion arail me doo jan ia;
MAT 15:9 Ari, me mal ar kaudok ia, pwe kujoned en aramaj eta, me re kin kaukawewe.
MAT 15:10 I ari molipe pena aramaj akan majani on irail: Ron o weweki!
MAT 15:11 Kaidin me kin ko on nan aua kin kajaminela aramaj, a me kin ko jan nan aua, i me kin kajaminela aramaj.
MAT 15:12 Tounpadak kan ap kodo, potoan on i: Re kotin mani, me Parijar akan makar kida ni ar ronadar majan o?
MAT 15:13 A kotin japen majani: Tuka karoj, me kaidin Jam ai nanlan, padukedier, pan weiweida.
MAT 15:14 Puei jan irail; irail me majkun, ap kalua me majkun akan. A ma me majkun amen pan kalua me majkun, nan ira karoj pan pupedi on nan por o.
MAT 15:15 Petruj ap japen potoan on i: Re kotin kawewe on kit karajeraj pot et.
MAT 15:16 I ari kotin majani: Komail pil jota lolekon?
MAT 15:17 Komail jaikenta weweki, meakaroj, me kin ko on nan aua kin kodilon on nan kaped o ap kin kajapokela?
MAT 15:18 A me kin ko jan nan aua, kin tapida jan nan monion, o i me kin kajaminela aramaj.
MAT 15:19 Pwe jan nan monion o lamelam jued kin tapi jan ia: Kamela aramaj, o kamal, o nenek, o pirap, o kadede likam, o lalaue.
MAT 15:20 Jon pukat, me kin kajaminela aramaj. A jo omiom ap mana jota kin kajaminela aramaj.
MAT 15:21 Iejuj ap kotila jan waja o, kotilan wein Tiruj o Jidon.
MAT 15:22 A kilan, li en Kanaan amen, me kodo jan waja o, likelikwir on i, potoan on: Kupura ia! Main, ir me japwilim en Dawid! Nai jereipein waiwairokki tewil.
MAT 15:23 A a jota kotin japen i meakot. Japwilim a tounpadak kan ap kai don i poeki re a potoan on: Re kotin kadarala i, pwe a kin likelikwir don kitail.
MAT 15:24 A kotin japen majani: Jota me I pakadara don, pwin jip en jaun Ijrael eta, me jalonalar.
MAT 15:25 A a kodo, poridi on i potoan on: Main, re kotin kupura ia!
MAT 15:26 A kotin japen majani: A jota mau, en ale en jeri ar tunol prot ap kajedi on ren kijin kidi kan.
MAT 15:27 A potoan on: Melel Main, ari jo, kijin kidi kan kin namenam maremor akan, me kin pupedi jan ni tepel en ar jaumaj.
MAT 15:28 Iejuj ap kotin japen majani on i: O li, om pojon mo laud! A pan wiaui on uk duen me koe inon ion. Na jeripein ap kelailadar ni auer ota.
MAT 15:29 Iejuj ari kotila jan waja koti don liman jed en Kalilaa a lao kotida pon dol eu ap kaipokedi waja o.
MAT 15:30 O pokon kalaimun pokondon i, me wado me danidan kai, o me majkun, o me loton, o me jikilikil, o jon toto, ap pwilikidi ni aluwilua. A ap kotin kakelail ir ada.
MAT 15:31 Pokon o ap puriamwuiki ni ar kilan, me loton akan lokolokaia, o me jikilikil akan kelailadar, o me danidan kan alialu, o me majkun akan kilan waja; rap kapina Kot en Ijrael.
MAT 15:32 Iejuj lao molipe pena japwilim a tounpadak kan a kotin majani: I ap pokela pokon en, pwe re mi re i ran jilu ap jota kan ar mana, a I jota pan kadar ir ala ni ar jota manaer, pwe ren der dupokala pon al o.
MAT 15:33 Japwilim a tounpadak kan ap potoan on i: Je pan kijan ia prot toto, men kamedela pokon et nan jap tan wet?
MAT 15:34 lejuj kotin majani on irail: lopon en prot me depa mi re omail? Irail potoan on: Me iju o kijin mam kij.
MAT 15:35 I ari kotin majani on pokon ii, on mondi on nan pwel o,
MAT 15:36 Ap kotikidar lopon en prot iju o kijin mam akai, laolaoki, pwilitiki pajan o kotiki on sapwilim a tounpadak kan, a tounpadak kan ap nek on pokon o.
MAT 15:37 Irail karoj ari manaer, o medier; irail ap deuk pena kopou iju luan kamadip o.
MAT 15:38 A irail, me manaer, me ol pakid, a li o jeri kan jota ian wadawader.
MAT 15:39 A lao kotin kadar pajan pokon o, a kotilan pon jop pot, koti don impan Maktala.
MAT 16:1 Parijar o Jadujar akan ap kodo, kajonejon i o poeki i kilel eu jan nanlan.
MAT 16:2 A ap kotin japen majani on iral: A lao jautiker komail kin inda: Lakap a pan ran kajelel eu, pwe lan me waitata.
MAT 16:3 A ni manjan: A pan katau, pwe lan me waitata o rotorot. Komail kak on kajauiada mom en lan, a komail jota kak kajauiada kilel en anjau.
MAT 16:4 Di jued o kamal o kin nonki kilel eu, a jota kilel eu, me pan janjal on irail, pwe kilel en Iona eta. I ari kotin muei jan irail o koti wei.
MAT 16:5 Japwilim a tounpadak kan lao kotela lel palio, ap jota arail prot, pwe re monokelar.
MAT 16:6 A Iejuj kotin majani on irail: Kalaka o pereki kalep en Parijar o Jadujar akan!
MAT 16:7 Irail ari kajokajoi nan pun arail indada: Nan pweki jota atail prot, me je wado.
MAT 16:8 Iejuj lao mani mepukat, ap kotin majani: Komail meid jopojon, menda komail kajokajoi nan pun omail, iran omail jota wado prot oko?
MAT 16:9 Komail jaikenta dedekila o komail jota tamanda lopon en prot limau ren aramaj limekid o kopou depa, me komail deuk penaer?
MAT 16:10 Pil jo lopon prot iju ren aramaj pakid, o kopou depa, me komail deuk penaer?
MAT 16:11 Daduen, komail jo lolekonki, me kaidin kijin mana, me i kajokajoi; pwe komail en pereki kalep en Parijiir o Jadujar akan,
MAT 16:12 Irail ap weweki, me a kaidin majanier, me ren kalaka kalep en prot, pwe ren kalaka padak en Parijiir o Jadujiir.
MAT 16:13 Iejuj lao koti don wein Jajarea Pilipi, ap kotin kainoma ren japwilim a tounpadak kan majani: Da me aramaj kin inda, ij me nai, Nain aramaj?
MAT 16:14 Irail potoan on: Akai: Ioanej jaunpaptaij, a akai: Eliaj, o pil akai: Ieremiaj de amen ren jaukop oko.
MAT 16:15 Ap kotin majani on irail: A komail, ij me komail kin inda me nai?
MAT 16:16 Jimon Petruj ap japen potoan on: Ir me Krijtuj, Japwilim en Kot ieiaj!
MAT 16:17 Iejuj ap kotin japen majani on i: Koe meid pai Jimon nain Iona, pwe kaidin uduk o nta, me kajale on uk met, pwe Jam ai, me kotikot nanlan,
MAT 16:18 A I pil indai on uk, koe Petruj, a I pan kauada pon paip wet ai momodijou a wanim en pweleko kan jota pan kak kawela
MAT 16:19 I pan ki on uk kapiri pan wein nanlan kan. A meakot koe pan jaliedi nin jappa, pan jalidi nanlan; o meakot, koe pan lapwada nin jappa, pan lapwada nanlan.
MAT 16:20 A ap kotin majani on japwilim a tounpadak kan, me ren der indan meamen, me i me Krijtuj.
MAT 16:21 I anjau me Iejuj kotin tapiadar kajale on japwilim a tounpadak kan, me a pan kotilan Ierujalem o kalokolok laud ren jaumaj akan, o ren jamereo lapalap akan o ren jaunkawewe kan, ome a pan kalokolok toto o kamela o ni ran kajilu a pan maureda,
MAT 16:22 Petruj ap ukadar I, kapukapun I indada: Main re kotin kupure pein ir, mepukat jota pan pai on ir!
MAT 16:23 A ap kotin jaupoido majani on Petruj: Kola muri Jatan! Koe men kamakar on ia, pwe om lamelam kaidin en Kot, a en aramaj,
MAT 16:24 Iejuj ap kotin majani on japwilim a tounpadak kan: Meamen pan idauen ia en tounmeteki pein i, ap wada a lopu, idauen ia.
MAT 16:25 Pwe meamen dorela maur a, pan pupe jan, a meamen kajela maur a pwreki nai, i me pan diarada.
MAT 16:26 Pwe da kadepa on aramaj o, ma a aneki jappa pon, ap kajela maur a? De da me aramaj pan kak kida, pwen kajapaledo maur a?
MAT 16:27 Pwe Nain aramaj pan kokido linan en Jam a, o japwilim a tounlan kan pan ian i; i ari pan pwain on aramaj akan duen ar wiawia kan.
MAT 16:28 Melel I indai on komail, akai me ian mimi met, me jota pan mela, irail lao kilan Nain aramaj a kodo nan a wei.
MAT 17:1 MURIN pon wonu pon Iejuj ap kotin ukadar Petruj, o Iakopuj, o ri a Ioanej kalua ir dalan pon nana ileila eu kalapuk.
MAT 17:2 I ari kotin linanla mo ’rail jilan i linalin dueta katipin, o japwilim a likau o puetpuet eta marain eu.
MAT 17:3 A kilan, Mojej o Eliaj pwaradon ir, kajokajoi on i.
MAT 17:4 Petruj ap japen potoan on Iejuj: Main, meid mau ataill kotikot met. Ma re kotin mauki, je pan kauada kijin im jili kij: Tanpaj ar, o eu japwilim en Mojej, o eu japwilim en Eliaj.
MAT 17:5 Ni a kajokajoidar, kilan, pali en dapok pali ap kadupal irail edi; o kilan, nil eu peidido jan nan dapok o, me majani: let nai ol kompok, me I kin polaule kida! Komail ron i!
MAT 17:6 Tounpadak kan lao ronadar met, rap pupedier pon maj arail, majapwekadar kaualap.
MAT 17:7 Iejuj ap kotido, jair ir, majani: Uda, der majak!
MAT 17:8 Irail lao jaradar, jota amen, me re kilaner, pwe Iejuj eta.
MAT 17:9 Ari, ni arail kotikot kodido jan ni nana o, Iejuj ap kotin majani on irail majani: Komail depa indai on meamen duen kajanjal o, Nain aramaj lao mauredar jan ren me melar akan.
MAT 17:10 Japwilim a tounpadak kan kalelapok re a indada: Da me sounkawewe kan kin indinda, dene Eliaj pan kotido maj?
MAT 17:11 A kotin japen majani on irail: Nan melel, Eliaj pan Pwarado maj kapunala karoj.
MAT 17:12 A nai indai on komail, Eliaj me pwaradoer, a re jaja i, pwe irail wiai on i meakan, me re men wiada. Iduen Nain aramaj pan kamekam re ’rail.
MAT 17:13 Tounpadak kan ap ajadar, me a kotin majani on irail duen Ioanij Jaunpaptaij o.
MAT 17:14 Irail lao lel don pokon o, aramaj amen poto don I kelepuki mo a jakaradar:
MAT 17:15 Main kupura nai ol o, pwe a pweipwei o madak kaualap, pwe pan pak toto a kin pupedi nan iai o nan pil,
MAT 17:16 Nai ari wa don i ren japwilim ar tounpadak kan, a irail jota kak kakelada i.
MAT 17:17 Iejuj ap kotin japen majani: Di wet me id jopojon o katiwo. la arain ai pan mi re omail? Ia arain ai pan kokoa komail? Wa don ia!
MAT 17:18 Iejuj ap kotin kidaua i, tewil ari kodi jan lole; putak o ap kelailadar ni auer ota.
MAT 17:19 A tounpadak kan ap kelep poto don Iejuj potoan on: Da me kit jo kak kaujeki wei jan i?
MAT 17:20 A ap kotin majani on irail: Aki omail jopojon. Pwe melel I indai on komail, ma omail pojon pan laude on wan katirin, komail pan kak indan nana wet: Koda jan waja en, kola monen! I ap pan kola, jota me jota pan kak pa omail.
MAT 17:21 Jon wet jota kin koki jan meakot, kapakap o kaijejol eta.
MAT 17:22 A ni ar kotikot jili nan wein Kalilaa, Iejuj kotin majani on irail: Nain aramaj pan panalan nan pa en aramaj.
MAT 17:23 Irail pan kamela i, a ni ran kajilu a pan maureda. Irail ari mamauk kaualap.
MAT 17:24 Irail lao kotilon on nan Kapernaum, jaunopwei kai ap ko don Petruj indan i: Omail Jaunpadak jota kin ian nopwei?
MAT 17:25 A majanier: Ei. A lao pedelon on nan im o, Iejuj ap kotin madan majani: Jimon, da me koe lamelame, nanmarki en jappa kin ale takjij de nopwei jan ren ij? Jan ren nairail jeri de jan men liki kan.
MAT 17:26 Petruj potoan on i: Jan ren men liki kan. Iejuj kotin majani on i: Ari, jeri kan me jaladok.
MAT 17:27 Ari jo, pwe kitail der kamakar irail ada, kola ni oror kajedi kaj, a mam men maj, me pan lodi, apiada, kajara pajan au a, koe pan diar lepen moni lep; i me koe pan ale o kida ai o noum.
MAT 18:1 NI auer ota tounpadak kan poto don Iejuj potoan on: Iaduen ij me pan lapalap nan wein nanlan?
MAT 18:2 Iejuj lao kotin molipeido kijin amen, ap kotin kotiki on nan pun arail,
MAT 18:3 Majani: Melel I indai on komail, ma komail jota pan wukila, wiala jon en kijin jeri, komail jota pan kak ko on nan wein nanlan.
MAT 18:4 Ari, meamen pan kajapwiledi pein i, dueta kijin jeri men et, i me pan lapalap nan wein nanlan.
MAT 18:5 O ma amen apwali kijin jeri men due met ni ad ai, i me kin apwali ia.
MAT 18:6 A meamen me pan kamakar amen ir, me tikitik, me pojon ia, a mau on, takai en plaua eu en jali on tapin wor a, ap kamopela nan madau waja me lol.
MAT 18:7 Juedi on jappa pweki a men kamakar akan, Ari jo, men kamakar akan udan mia; juedi on aramaj o, me men kamakar pan tapi jan ia.
MAT 18:8 A ma apali en pa om de apali en ne om pan kamakar uk, lepuke jan, o kaje jan uk, pwe a mau on uk ko on maur ni om danidan de jikilikil, jan om pa de na pokon mia, ap ko on kijiniai joutuk.
MAT 18:9 O ma apali en maj om pan kamakar uk, waikada jan o kaje jan uk, pwe a mau on uk, ko on maur ni om maj pali, jan maj om pokon mia ap lokidokila nan iai en pweleko.
MAT 18:10 Kalaka, pwe komail der mamaleki amen tikitik pukat; pwe I indai on komail, me arail tounlan kan, me mi nanlan, kin ariri Jam ai, me kotikot nanlan.
MAT 18:11 Pwe Nain aramaj kodon dorela, me jalonalar akan.
MAT 18:12 Da me komail lamelame, ma aramaj amen, naineki jip epuki, a amen irail pan jalonala, a jo pan pwilikidi duekduamen pon nana, ap kola raparapaki me jaloriala?
MAT 18:13 A ma a pan diar, melel I indai on komail, a pan peren kida, me men en jan duekduamen, me jota jalonalar.
MAT 18:14 Iduen Jam omail, me kotikot nanlan, jota kotin men, amen kijin jeri pukat en jalonala.
MAT 18:15 A ma ri om ol wia dip on uk, en kelep kila i, kapun on i dip a; ma a pan ron uk, nan koe kajapaledo ri om.
MAT 18:16 A ma a jota pan ron uk, ap ukada amen de riamen, pwe meakaroj en mi ren jaunkadede riamen de jilimen.
MAT 18:17 A ma a kan ron irail, ap kaireki momodijou, a ma a pil kan ron momodijou, ap wia kin i men liki o jaunopwei men.
MAT 18:18 Melel I indai on komail, me komail pan jaliedi nin jappa, pan jalidi nanlan, o me komail pan lapwada nin jappa, pan lapwada nanlan.
MAT 18:19 I pil indai on komail, ma riamen nin jappa pan minimin pene ni meakot, me re men poeki, a pan pwai on ira jan Jam ai, me kotikot nanlan.
MAT 18:20 Pwe waja kij, me riamen de jilimen pokon pena ni ad ai, i waja I kin mi nan pun arail.
MAT 18:21 Petruj ap kai don i potoan on: Main, pan pak depa i en makeki on ri ai ol o, me wia dip on ia? A itar ma a pan me Ijepak?
MAT 18:22 lejuj kotin majani on i: I indai on uk, kaidin ijepak eta, a pan pak iju wad ijeijok.
MAT 18:23 I me wein nanlan rajon nanmarki amen, me pan kapukapun na ladu kan.
MAT 18:24 A ni a tapiada kapukapun, amen ap wijike don i, me pwaipwaimdeki talent nen.
MAT 18:25 A ni jota a men pwain, a monjap ap majanier, me a pan netila, o a paud, o na jeri kan, o karoj, me a aneki, pwen pwainda.
MAT 18:26 A ladu o ap poridi mo a poni, potoan on: Main kom kotin kanonama on ia, i pan pwain on komui karoj.
MAT 18:27 A monjap en ladu o ap pokela, ap lapwada o makeki on i a pwaipwand.
MAT 18:28 A ladu ota ap koieila, diaradar kij a ladu amen, me pwaipwand on i denar epuki; i ari koledi i, padik pena tapin wor a indada: Kapunala, ma om pwaipwand mia.
MAT 18:29 Ladu ap poridi mo a, poeki indada: Kom kotin kanonama on ia, i pan pwain on komui.
MAT 18:30 A a kan, ap koieila, kajedi on nan imaten lao a kapunala a pwaipwand.
MAT 18:31 A kij a ladu kan lao kilaner me wiauier, rap mauk kaualap, koieila kaireki arail monjap karoj, me wiauier.
MAT 18:32 A monjap ap ekere don i, majani on i: Koe meid ladu jued amen! I make ki on uk er om pwaipwand karoj pweki om poeki re i.
MAT 18:33 Menda koe jota kadek on ri om ladu, duen i kin kadek on uk er?
MAT 18:34 A monjap ap makar kidar o panalan i ren jaun kalokolok lao a kapunalar a pwaipwand karujia.
MAT 18:35 Iduen Jam ai nanlan, pan pil wia on komail, ma komail jota pan makeki jan nan monion omail on ri omail.
MAT 19:1 KADEKADEO lejuj lao kaimwijokela padak pukat, ap kotila jan Kalilaa, koti don wein Iudaa palilan Iordan.
MAT 19:2 O pokon kalaimun idauendo i. I ari kotin kakelail ir adar waja o.
MAT 19:3 Parijar akai ap kodo kajonejon i indada: Me pun, ol en kajela a paud pweki okotme?
MAT 19:4 A ap kotin japen majani: Komail jota doropwe, me i, me wia ir adar ni tapio, a kotin wiadar ol o li?
MAT 19:5 A ap kotin majani: I me aramaj amen pan pweidedi jam a in a pat on eta a paud; ira ari pan udukala eu;
MAT 19:6 Ira ari jolar riamen pwe uduk eu. Ari, me Kot kotin kapad penaer, aramaj depa kamueit pajan.
MAT 19:7 Irail ap indai on i: A da me Mojej majaniki, kijin likau en kamueit en koda, ol ap pan muei jan a paud?
MAT 19:8 A kotin majani on irail: Mojej mueid on komail er, en kajela omail paud akan pweki monion omail kapitakailar. A jan ni tapi o a jota kin due.
MAT 19:9 A nai indai on komail: meamen kajela a paud, ma jota pweki nenek, ap paudekida amen; nan a kamal, o me pan paudeki, me lokidokilar o, a kin kamal.
MAT 19:10 Japwilim a tounpadak kan ap potoan on i: Ma iduen kujoned, me ol o en kapwaiadan a paud, a jota mau on papaud.
MAT 19:11 A ap kotin majani on ir: Kaidin karoj, me pan kak weweki padak pot et, irail eta, me a muei on er.
MAT 19:12 Pwe akai mia, me udan jota unjok, a akai, me aramaj ki janer, a pil akai, me wia kapwat pweki wein nanlan. Meamen kak on weweki, i en weweki.
MAT 19:13 Kijin jeri kai ap wijike don i, pwen pwil po ’rail lim a kan o laolaoki, a tounpadak kan kapoui irail.
MAT 19:14 A Iejuj kotin majani: Mueid on kijin jeri kan, en ko don ia. Der kalik irail edi! Pwe iei jon en me udan wein nanlan.
MAT 19:15 I ari kotikida po ’rail lim a kan. ap kotila jan waja o.
MAT 19:16 O kilan, amen poto don i potoan on: Jaunpadak da me mau kot, i en wiada, pwe i en aneki maur joutuk?
MAT 19:17 A ap kotin majani on i: Menda koe idok re i duen me mau? Pwe amen ta me mau. A ma koe men ko on maur, dadaurata kujoned akan!
MAT 19:18 A ap potoan on: Kujoned da? A Iejuj kotin majani, iet akan: Koe der kamela aramaj; Koe der kamal; Koe der pirap; Koe der kadede likam;
MAT 19:19 Kakaki jam om o in om; o pok on men imp om dueta on pein uk.
MAT 19:20 Manakap ap potoan on i: Mepukat karoj i kapwaiadar; a da me i en pil wia?
MAT 19:21 Iejuj kotin majani on i: Ma koe men unjokela, u kowei, netikila om dipijou, ap kijakijaki on me jamama kan, koe ap pan aneki om pai nanlan, o kodo idauen ia do.
MAT 19:22 Manakap lao roner majan pot et, ap mamauk koieila, pwe a dipijou me toto.
MAT 19:23 Iejuj ap kotin majani on japwilim a tounpadak kan: Melel I indai on komail, meid apwal on me kapwapwa kan, en pedelon on nan wein nanlan.
MAT 19:24 I pil katitiki on komail, me manai, kamel en tilon nan au en dikok eu, jan me kapwapwa en ko on nan wein Kot.
MAT 19:25 Japwilim a tounpadak kan lao ronadar met, ap puriamuiki kaualap indada: Ari, ij me pan kak kamaurela?
MAT 19:26 Iejuj ap kotin jaupei won irail, ap kotin majani on irail: A jo kak pan aramaj, a ren Kot meakoj me kak.
MAT 19:27 Petruj ap japen poto don i: Majani, kit likidmaliela meakaroj, ap idedauen komui, a da me pan katini kit
MAT 19:28 Iejuj ap kotin majani on irail: Melel I indai on komail, komail me idedauen ia do ni Ipwi japal, Nain aramaj lao mondi pon mole linan, komail pil pan mondi pon deun kadeik, kakaunda kainok en Ijrael ei jokriau.
MAT 19:29 O meamen kajela im a kan, de ri a ol o li akan, de jam a, de in a, de a paud, de jeri, de sap pweki ad ai, nan a pan ale pak epuki o jojoki maur joutik.
MAT 19:30 A me toto men moa, pan muri; a men muri pan moa.
MAT 20:1 Pwe wein nanlan rajon kaun pan im amen, me jankonai on raparapaki toundodok kai nan a mat en wain.
MAT 20:2 Irail lao inauki pena, me denar eu ni ran eu, ap kadar ir ala nan a mat en wain.
MAT 20:3 A pil kotila ni auer kajilu, ap majani akai, me momod mal nan deun jaunet akan,
MAT 20:4 Ap majani on irail: Komail pil kola nan mat en wain o, o meakot me pun, i pan pwain on komail; irail ari kola.
MAT 20:5 A pil kola ni auer kawonu o kaduau o wiadar dueta.
MAT 20:6 A pil kotila ni auer eijokeu, ap diaradar akai, me momod mal, ap majani on irail: Da me komail momodeki mal ranpon?
MAT 20:7 Irail potoan on: Aki jota amen, me kadokeki kit. Ap majani on irail: Komail pil kola nan mat en wain o, komail pan ale me pun.
MAT 20:8 A lao jautik penaer monjap en mat en wain majani on a jaunkoa: Kapokon pena toundodok kan o pwain on irail. Tapiada jan ren men pwand oko lao kokodo lei men madan kan,
MAT 20:9 Me kadodokier ni klok eijokeu kan ap kodo, amen amen ap ale denar eu.
MAT 20:10 A men maj akan lao kodo, rap kiki on, me re pan ale jiki jan, a re pil aleer denar ta ieu.
MAT 20:11 Irail lao ale, rap lipaned on monjap o.
MAT 20:12 Indada: Mepukat dodok auer ta ieu, a komui karajai kit pena; kit me dodokki apwal en ran o karakar en katipin.
MAT 20:13 A ap kotin japen majani on amen re ’rail: Kompoke pai, kaidin me japun, me i wiai on uk. Kita jota inauki pena denar eu?
MAT 20:14 Ale me om, kowei, i men pwain on me pwand pukat rajon uk.
MAT 20:15 De iaduen, a jota pun, i en wiaki me udan ai, me i mauki? De por en maj om me jued pweki ai kadek?
MAT 20:16 Ari, me pwand akan pan moa, a me moa kan pan pwand, pwe me toto paeker, a me malaulau me piladar.
MAT 20:17 Iejuj lao kotin kodala Ierujalem, a kotin kelepe kila tounpadak ekriamen pon al a, majani on irail:
MAT 20:18 Kilan, kitail kin kodalan Ierujalem o Nain aramaj pan ko on ren jamero lapalap o jaunkawewe kan, o irail pan kadeikada, en kamela i.
MAT 20:19 O re pan panala i ren men liki kan, pwen kapikapiti i, o kaloke, o kalopuela, a ni ran kajilu a pan maureda.
MAT 20:20 In en nain Jepedauj ap poto don i, a na putak riamen ian i, poni i o poeki okotme re a.
MAT 20:21 A ap kotin majani on i: Da me koe mauki? A potoan on i: Re kotin mueid on ai tunol putak riamen, en mondi re ir, amen ni pali maun omui, amen ni pali main omui nan omui wei.
MAT 20:22 A lejuj kotin japen majani: Koma jota aja, me koma poeki. Koma kak nim dal me I pan nim? Ira potoan on: Je kak.
MAT 20:23 A kotin majani on ira: Melel, komail pan tunole ai dal, a momod ni pali maun o main i, I jota kak mueid on, pwe pwaij en irail me a onop oner jan ren Jam ai.
MAT 20:24 Ni en ek oko ar ronadar, ap juede kidar pirien o.
MAT 20:25 A lejuj kotin molipe ir do majani: Komail aja, duen jaupeidi en wei pokon ar kin poe irail edi, o me lapalap akan kin manaman on irail.
MAT 20:26 A duen met a jota pan wiaui nan pun omail. A me men laud nan pun omail, en papa komail.
MAT 20:27 O meamen re omail, me men jaumaj, i en lidui komail.
MAT 20:28 Dueta Nain aramaj, me kaidin kodo, pwe aramaj en papa, a pwii i on papa o kida maur a wiliandi mo toto.
MAT 20:29 Ni arail kotila jan Ieriko, pokon kalaimun idauen la i.
MAT 20:30 A kilan, ol majkun riamen momod ni kailan al o. Ni ara ronadar, me lejuj kotin daulul, ira ap likelikwir indada: Main kupura kit, ir me japwilim en Dawid!
MAT 20:31 A pokon o kidau ira da, pwen nenenla. A ira kalaudela ara likelikwir indada: Main, kupura kit, ir me japwilim en Dawid!
MAT 20:32 lejuj ari kotin udi, molipe ira do majani: Da me koma mauki, I en wiai on koma?
MAT 20:33 Ira potoan on: Main, maj at en kapad pajan!
MAT 20:34 lejuj ari kupuro kin ira dar o kotin jair maj ara. Maj ara ari madan pad pajaner; ira ap idauenla i.
MAT 21:1 NI arail koren ion Ierujalem o lel on Petpake impan dol Oliwe, lejuj ap kotin poronela tounpadak riamen.
MAT 21:2 Majani on ira: Koma ko on nan kanim monen, a madan koma pan diar ejel amen, me jalidi, o na pul mi imp a, lapwa ira da, ap kare don ia!
MAT 21:3 A ma meamen pan indan koma meakot, koma pan indada: Kaun o men dake, i ari pan madan kadar ira do.
MAT 21:4 A mepukat karoj wiauier, pwen pwaida, me lokido ren jaukop o me majani:
MAT 21:5 Kaireki nain Jion jeripein: Kilan, om Nanmarki kotido re om. A kotin opampap o kaipokedi pon ejel li amen.
MAT 21:6 A tounpadak ko lao kolar, o wiadar duen Iejuj kotin majani on ira
MAT 21:7 Ira ap wado ejel o na, ap irepadi po ’ra arail likau kan a ap kotin kaipokedi poa.
MAT 21:8 O pokon kalaimunia irepadi arail likau kan nani al o, a akai paledier ran tuka kan irepadi nani al o.
MAT 21:9 A pokon o, me tion moa, o me idauen, nijinij indada: Ojiana on japwilim en Dawid! Meid iajanai me kotido ni mar en Kaun, ojiana nanlan.
MAT 21:10 A lao kotilon on nan Ierujalem, toun kanim ap mokimokid indada: Ij i?
MAT 21:11 Pokon o katitiki: Nan i Iejuju, jaukop en Najaret en kalilaa.
MAT 21:12 Iejuj ap kotilon on nan im ni kaudok en Kot, ap kotin kajejan karoj, me kin netinet nan im en kaudok, o kotin wukededi tepel en jaunkawilian moni ko, o deun men netin muroi.
MAT 21:13 O kotin majani on irail: A Intinidi: Im ai pan adaneki im en kapakap, a komail wia kilar deu en lipirap.
MAT 21:14 A me majkun o me jikil akan poto don i nan im en kaudok o; i ari kotin kakel irail adar.
MAT 21:15 A jamero lapalap o jaunkawewe kan lao kilaner manaman akan, me a kotin wiadar, o jeri kan nan im en kaudok, me nijinij indada: Ojiana on japwilim en Dawid! Irail ap makarakidar,
MAT 21:16 lndai on i: Kom jota mani, mepukat katitiki? A Iejuj kotin majani on irail: Ei, komail jaikenta doropwe: Jan nan au en jeri o me kin kan didi, ir me kotin kapwaiadar kapin eu?
MAT 21:17 I ari kotin muei jan irail, kotila jan nan kanim o, koti don Petanien o pweiokidi waja o.
MAT 21:18 A ni manjan ni a kotin purlan kanim o, ap men konotedar:
MAT 21:19 A kotin majani tuka pik pot ni kailan al o, ap kotilan i. A jota, me a kotin diaradar, pwe ta eta, ap kotin majani on i: Koe jolar pan wa kokolata! A tuka pik ap madan monedier.
MAT 21:20 Tounpadak kan lao kilaner, irail ap puriamui kidar indada: Daduen tuka pik o madan monelar.
MAT 21:21 A Iejuj kotin japen majani on irail: Melel I indai on komail, ma komail pojon, ap jota peikajal, kaidin met eta, me wiaui on tuka pik en, me komail pan kak wiada, pwe ma komail pan indan nana wet: Mokid wei lokidokila nan madau, nan a pan pwaida.
MAT 21:22 O meakaroj komail pan poeki ni omail kapakap, ap pojon komail pan ale.
MAT 21:23 A lao kotilon on nan im en kaudok o, jamero lapalap akan o jaumaj en toun jap o ap ko don I ni a kotin kaukawewe indada: Manaman en ij, me komui wiaki mepukat? O ij me ki on komui manaman wet?
MAT 21:24 A Iejuj kotin japen majani on irail: I pan pil kalelapok meakot re omail, ma komail pan japen ia, I pil pan indan komail manaman en ij, me I wiaki mepukat.
MAT 21:25 En Ioanej a paptaij a tapi jan ia? Men nanlan de me ren aramaj? Irail ap lamelame nan pun arail katiti, ma kitail pan inda men nanlan, a pan majani on kitail: Da me komail jo pojonki i?
MAT 21:26 A ma kitail inda, me ren aramaj, kitail majak pokon o, pwe karoj kin wia jaukopki loanej,
MAT 21:27 Irail ari japen lejuj potoan on: Kit jota potoan. I ari pil majani on irail: I jota pil pan indai on komail, manaman en ij, me I wiaki mepukat.
MAT 21:28 A iaduen omail lamelam? Aramaj amen naineki ol riamen. A kola ren amen indan i: Lao, kola ran wet dodok nan ai mat en wain.
MAT 21:29 A japen indada: I jota mauki; a mur ekij a kalukila, ap koieila.
MAT 21:30 O a kola ren me teio indai on pil dueta. I me japen indada: Ei main; ap jota kola.
MAT 21:31 Ari, ij re ’ra, me wiadar injen en jam a? Irail potoan on i: Men maj o. lejuj kotin majani on irail: Melel I indai on komail, jaunopwei o me nenek kan pan mo ’mail pedelon on nan wein Kot.
MAT 21:32 Pwe loanej pwara don komail, padapadak on komail duen al pun, a komail jota kamelele i; a jaunopwei o me nenek kan kamelele i. A komail lao kilaner, komail jota kalukila, pwen kamele i.
MAT 21:33 Komail ron pil apot karajaraj! Kaun pan im amen padukedier mat en wain eu o kelepene, ap weiradar deun men wunid wan wain, o kauada im en daulik eu, ap kajile kin i on jaumat akai, o momaitelar nan wai.
MAT 21:34 A lao anjau en rak, a kadaralan jaumat akan a ladu kai, pwen ale a wan wain.
MAT 21:35 Jaumat akan ap jaikedi a ladu kan; re woki amen, kamela amen, a amen me re kate.
MAT 21:36 A pil kadarala ladu kai, toto jan men maj, Irail ari wiai on irail pil dueta.
MAT 21:37 A ikmuri a kadara won irail na ol majani: Nan re pan majak nai ol.
MAT 21:38 A jaumat akan lao kilaner ol o, irail ap kajokajoi nan pun arail: I me pan ale jojo, ukodo kitail en kamela i, a kitail pan id ale a jojo.
MAT 21:39 Irail ari jaikedi i o kajapoke jan i nan mat en wain o, o kamela i.
MAT 21:40 Ari, monjap en mat en wain lao pwarado, da me a pan wiai on jaumat pukat?
MAT 21:41 Irail potoan on i: A pan kamela aramaj jued pukat, ap pan neki on akai jaumat a mat en wain o, me pan ki on i wan wain ni anjau me kon on.
MAT 21:42 lejuj ap kotin majani on irail: Komail jaikenta doropwer nan kijin likau kan: Takai o, me jauje kan kajapokelar, ap id wialar takai en pukakaim. Me pukat wiauier ren Kaun o, men kapuriamui patail?
MAT 21:43 I me I indai on komail, wein Kot pan japadoke jan komail, ap ko on eu kainok, me pan kida wa.
MAT 21:44 O meamen pupedi on pon takai wet, pan ola, a meamen me a pan pupedi on poa, a pan pitaki pajan i.
MAT 21:45 A jamero lapalap o Parijar akan lao ronadar a karajeraj akan, re mulikiadar, me a kotin karajeraje kin irail.
MAT 21:46 Irail ari majamajan jili en jaikidi i, a re majak aramaj akan, pwe re wia kin i jaukop amen.
MAT 22:1 A IEJUJ kotin japen o pil karajeraj on irail majani:
MAT 22:2 Wein nanlan raj on nanmarki amen, me kamadipe na ol ni ran en a kapapaud.
MAT 22:3 O a kadarala na ladu kan, pwen luke don kamadip o, me kileledier akan; a re kan kodo.
MAT 22:4 A pil kadarala akai ladu majani: Kaireki me kileledier akan: Kilan, i kaonopadar ai kamadip o: nai kau ol o man wi kan me kamelar, o karoj nikier, ko don kamadip en kapapaud!
MAT 22:5 A irail jota injenoki, ap kowei, amen nan japwe, o amen ko on dodok.
MAT 22:6 A me tei kan jaikidi a ladu kan kaloke o kame ir ala.
MAT 22:7 Nanmarki ap makara kidar, kadarala a jaunpei kan, kamela me lolap oko o ijikedar ar kanim
MAT 22:8 A ap indan a ladu kan: Ari, kamadip onoper, a me kileledier akan jota war on.
MAT 22:9 Komail ari kowei nan al akan, a karoj me komail diar, en kalua don kamadip o.
MAT 22:10 Ladu kan ap kola nani al akan, kapokon pena karoj, me irail diaradar, me jued o me mau kan kamadip ari tounlar.
MAT 22:11 A nanmarki lao pwarado, en kilan toun kamadip, ap diaradar aramaj amen, me jota a kapwat,
MAT 22:12 A ap majani on i: Kompoke pai, iaduen om kak pedelon, pwe jota om kapwat? I ari japai mokid.
MAT 22:13 Nanmarki ap majani on papa kan: Jaliedi i pa o na akan, ale o kajapokela nan rotorot liki iei wajan maiei o teterok.
MAT 22:14 Pwe me toto paekeredo, a me malaulau piladar.
MAT 22:15 Parijar ap pokon pena, kaparok pena duen ar pan kajapuna i jan a majan;
MAT 22:16 Irail ap kadaralan i nairail tounpadak kan ianaki ladun Erodej kan, potoan on: Jaunpadak, je aja, ir me kotin melel, o kotin kawewe melel duen al en Kot o re jota kotin kupuroki meamen, pwe re jota kotin kajampwaleki janjal en aramaj.
MAT 22:17 Ari, re kotin majani on kit kupur ar. Me pun, en nopwei on nanmarki de jo?
MAT 22:18 A Iejuj lao kotin mani ar me juet, ap majani: Malaun komail, da me komail kajonejon kin ia?
MAT 22:19 Kajale don ia moni en nopwei! Irail ap potoan on i denar eu.
MAT 22:20 A kotin majani on irail: Mom en ij o intin wet?
MAT 22:21 Irail potoan on i: En nanmarki, a i kotin majani on irail: Ari, komail ki on nanmarki, me nain nanmarki, o on Kot, me japwilim en Kot.
MAT 22:22 Irail lao ronadar met, rap puriamuiki o muei jan i, o koin lar.
MAT 22:23 Ran ota Jadujar akai ko don i, me kin inda, me dene me melar akan jolar pan maureda, ap kalelapok re a.
MAT 22:24 Indada: Jaunpadak, Mojej majani, ma meamen melar o jota na jeri, ri a ol en id paudeki a paud, pwen kaipwi on ri a kadaudok a.
MAT 22:25 Ari, pwin pirien eu mi re at, ol ijimen. Mejeni paudeki li amen, ap melar, a jota kadaudok a, ap kakaliki on ri a ol a paud;
MAT 22:26 Pil dueta kariamen o kajili men kokola lao kaijimen.
MAT 22:27 A ikmuri li o pil melar.
MAT 22:28 Ari; ni en me melar akan ar pan iajada, a pan en ij a paud ren me ijimen, pwe irail karoj me paudekidar i?
MAT 22:29 A Iejuj kotin japen majani on irail: Komail meid japun pwe komail jo weweki kijin likau kan de mana en Kot.
MAT 22:30 Pwe me mauredar akan jolar pan papaud de kapapaud, pwe irail dueta tounlan en Kot akan, me mimi nanlan.
MAT 22:31 Komail jaik doropwe duen en melar akan ar pan maureda, me lolok on komail jan ren Kot, me kotin majani:
MAT 22:32 Nai Kot en Apraam o en Ijaak o en Iakop? A kaidin Kot en me melar akan, pwe en me maur akan.
MAT 22:33 A pokon o lao ronadar met, irail ap puriamuiki a padak.
MAT 22:34 A Parijar akan lao ronadar, me a kotin kadukiedier Jadujar akan, ap pokon pena.
MAT 22:35 Amen irail, jaunkawewe men, kajonjon i potoan on:
MAT 22:36 Jaunpadak, kujoned da me lapalap nan kapun o?
MAT 22:37 A Iejuj kotin majani on i: Koe en pokeki on Kot om Kaun monion om unjok, o nen om unjok, o om lamelam unjok.
MAT 22:38 lei met me moa en kujoned akan.
MAT 22:39 O me kariau me dueta: Koe en pok on men imp om dueta on pein koe.
MAT 22:40 Kujoned riau met me audepan kapun o jaukop akan.
MAT 22:41 Ni en Parijar akan ar momod pena, Iejuj ap kotin kainoma re ’rail.
MAT 22:42 Majani: Da me komail lamelame duen Krijtuj, nain ij i? Re potoan on: Japwilim en Dawid.
MAT 22:43 A kotin majani on irail: A iaduen da me Dawid kaadaneki i Kaun ren Nen ni a majani:
MAT 22:44 Kaun o kotin majani on ai Kaun, mondi on ni pali maun i, lao I pan wia kida om imwintiti utipan na om?
MAT 22:45 A iaduen, ma Dawid kaadaneki i Kaun, a pil pan kak na ol?
MAT 22:46 A jota amen, me kak japenki i meakot, o jolar me idok meakot re a kokolata.
MAT 23:1 IEJUJ ap kotin kaparok on pokon o japwilim a tounpadak kan,
MAT 23:2 Majani; Jaunkawewe o Parijar akan kin mondi nan deun Mojej.
MAT 23:3 Ari, karoj me re indan komail, i me komail en wia o kapwaiada, a dor ale jaw ar wiawia kan; pwe irail kin indada, ap jota kapwaiada.
MAT 23:4 Re kin pira pena kapwa en wijik me toutou melel, ap kidan pon apar en aramaj, a irail jota men jairki jondin pa arail.
MAT 23:5 O re kin kapwaiada ar wiawia kan karoj, pwe aramaj en ududial. Pwe irail kin kadalape ar kijin likau en kataman o kalaudela ni kailan ar likau.
MAT 23:6 Irail kin nonki mondi ni tapin tepel ni kamadip o, o leppandam nan jinakoke kan.
MAT 23:7 O re kin mauki, aramaj en ranamau on irail nan deun net, o aramaj en wia kin ir Rapi, Rapi,
MAT 23:8 A komail der wonki, aramaj en wia kin komail Rapi, pwe me ta men omail Jaunpadak, a komail pirien pena.
MAT 23:9 O komail der kaadaneki meamen jam nan jappa, pwe amen Jam omail, me kotikot nanlan.
MAT 23:10 O komail der nonki, aramaj en wia kin komail jaumaj, pwe me ta men omail Jaumaj: Krijtuj.
MAT 23:11 A me lapalap re omail, en omail papa.
MAT 23:12 Pwe me pan kajapwilada pein i, pan japwilidi, a me pan Kujapwilidi pein i, pan kajapwilada.
MAT 23:13 Juedi on komail jaunkawewe o Parijar akan, malaun komail! Komail kin ritinidi wein nanlan mon aramaj akan, pwe komail jota pan pedelon, a me men pedelon, komail jota kin mueid on.
MAT 23:14 Juedi on komail jaunkawewe o Parijar akan, malaun komail! Komail me nopur jan im en li odi kan ap liliajoj kapakap reirei. Omail kalokolok pan laud melel.
MAT 23:15 Juedi on komail jaunkawewe o Parijar akan, malaun komail! Komail kin pidipidaki jed o jap, pwen wiada projelit amen, a lao wialar, komail ap pan wia kin i toun pweleko amen, me jued jan komail.
MAT 23:16 Juedi on komail jaunkalua majkun, komail me kin inda: Meamen kin kaukila im en kaudok, dene jota katepa, a me kin kaukila kold en im en kaudok, i me pun.
MAT 23:17 Komail pweipwei o majkun, pwe da me kajampwal ren kold de im en kaudok o, me kin kajarauiala kold?
MAT 23:18 O meamen kin kaukila pei jaraui, dene jota katepa, a me kaukila mairon, me mi poa dene I me pun,
MAT 23:19 Komail pweipwei o majkun, pwe da me kajampwal ren mairon de pei jaraui, me kin kajarauiala mairon?
MAT 23:20 Ari, meamen kaukila pei jaraui, kin kaukila i o meakan, me mi poa.
MAT 23:21 O meamen kaukila im en kaudok, kin kaukila i ianaki i me kotikot lole.
MAT 23:22 O me kaukila nanlan, kin kaukila mol en Kot o me kin kaipokedi on poa.
MAT 23:23 Juedi on komail jaunkawewe o Parijar akan, malaun komail! Komail kin maironki eijokkij eu en minje, o til, o kimel, ap jota injenoki kujoned en kapun kajampwal akan: Pun, o kadek, o pojon. Komail wiada mepukat, ap pil kapwaiada me tei kan!
MAT 23:24 Jaunkalua majkun komail, me kin ijenoki kijin am enwel, ap katalala kamel!
MAT 23:25 Juedi on komail jaunkawewe o Parijar akan, malaun komail! Pwe komail kin kamakelekel kajak o dal liki, a lol me dir en me re kuliada o me jued.
MAT 23:26 Parijar majkun koe, kamakelekele maj lol en kajak o dal akan, pwe pali liki en pil makelekeleda!
